0,health,Indeed,p_6ebee209a4826c7e,Medewerker klantenservice,Health Tests  Supplies BV, Amsterdam,"Ben jij parttime of fulltime beschikbaar? En een probleemoplosser? Heb jij een luisterend oor? Je houdt van puzzelen? En je bent een mee-denker?Kom dan ons jonge en dynamische team versterken!Ons aanbod is:Flexibele werktijden want we zijn staan 24 uur per dag klaar voor onze klantenBepaal voor je zelf hoeveel je wilt werken.Leuke collega’s.De mogelijkheid om mee te groeien in een jong en nieuw bedrijf.Een leuk salaris die past bij jou inzetbaarheid.De functie eisen zijn:Veerkracht heb je nodig bij de klantenservice van corona teststraat. Met zorg en zekerheid kun je uitleggen hoe onze producten onze klanten kunnen helpen. Het ultieme is als er iemand op gezond op reis kan door onze hulp. Natuurlijk ben jij ook de speel in het bewaken van de klant zijn persoonsgegevens.Degene die wij zoeken is?Die vriendelijke, open klantenservice medewerker die zin heeft om klanten blij te maken.Die betrouwbare, discrete medewerker met een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel?Is iemand die service hoog in het vaandel heeft staan.heeft een helikopterview over het gehele proces.Stressbestendig en weet snel te schakelen.Klinkt goed?Solliciteer dan direct! Stuur ons je cv en voeg een kleine motivatie toe waarom we jou moeten bellen?Contractduur 3 maandenSoort dienstverband: Bepaalde tijd, Freelance/ZZPSalaris: €11,00 - €15,00 per uurErvaring:Klantenservice: 1 jaar (Aanbevolen)Locatie:Amsterdam (Vereist)Taken:Beantwoorden van klantvragenVastleggen van klantinformatie in de klantenservice databaseGa op een professionele en vriendelijke manier met klanten om en luister actief naar hun problemenBied klanten hulp en oplossingen aan in overeenstemming met het klantenservice beleid van het bedrijf.Thuiswerken:NeeVoorzorgsmaatregelen tegen het coronavirus:Op afstand solliciterenPersoonlijke beschermingsmiddelen worden uitgedeeld/zijn verplichtPlexiglas schermen op werkplekkenEr gelden richtlijnen voor social distancingEr zijn ontsmettings-, desinfecteer- of schoonmaakprocedures van kracht",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 1,health,Indeed,pj_4a45e5c84a65c7a6,Copy writer online marketeer Poland,Ledstores Europe, Amsterdam,"Do you regularly shop online and would you like to work behind the scenes at a web store? Does online marketing energize you, just like SEO and social media? Would you like to help our number of customers grow by the efforts you make? We are looking for you!For our ambition to grow with 10 web stores specialized in LED lighting, we are looking for an enthusiastic content and online marketeer for new markets we would like to enter Poland and the markets we are already selling to (Denmark, France, Germany, Spain, and more).Who is Ledstores?Ledstores Europe manages and operates several (international) webshops, all specialized in LED lighting. We strive with a team of enthusiastic employees to make European companies and consumers choose for LED lighting. In this way we work every day on a greener life in a more sustainable world.From our headquarters in Amsterdam we organize customer service, marketing, administration and order processing for all European countries in which we deliver. Moreover, we continue to grow, for example with the ambition for a total of 12 webshops.With the growth success that Ledstores has achieved, it has achieved a number of nominations and awards such as: the FD Gazellen 2020, we are in the CrossBorder top 30, in the Twinkle 100 and in the Sprout challenger50 of 2020 the list with the most challenging and fast growing companies in the Netherlands. Will you help to make Ledstores even bigger? Then we are looking for you!What are you actually going to do?Improving the online presence of our webshop
column2: Working on our online marketing strategy
column3: Analyzing results in Google Ads and Google Analytics
column4: Working on e-mail marketing, social advertising and SEO.What can you count on?As part of the Ledstores Family:You work in a super enthusiastic and young team
column5: Are you proud to work on a fast growing scale-up
column6: Do you have a varied job
column7: You will find yourself in a warm bath of nice colleagues
column8: Are there opportunities (and budget) for personal and professional growth
column9: Is there a staff discount on the entire assortment
column10: Do you have a chance to win a performance bonus
column11: Is there a collective discount on health insurance
column12: Do you receive more than a competitive salaryReceive your travel allowance
column13: A daily lunch of the company and ‘Pizza Friday!Is there a chair massage every month
column15: Is there a lounge with Playstation, table soccer / tennis and darts
column16: Is there every Friday, just like when we feel like it, a cozy drink : -)
column17: If you have any time left, we also have a nice collaboration with ClassPass
column18: As last but not least, a bike from the store!What makes you the best?Did you study or are you still studying online marketing or similar studies? We are looking for commercial talents with a fine touch voor online marketing. Furthermore, you are easy communicating and flexible to adapt to ever changing (online) environments.Fluent in Polish and fluent in English
column19: Socially strong: both within the team and to customers
column20: Living close to Amsterdam or willing to relocate
column21: Experience with Photoshop is a plus
column22: Lives in or around Amsterdam in a radius of 25km.Is this something for you?Have you become enthusiastic and meet the required qualifications? Please let us know who you are and send your resume and motivation to: hr at ledstores.nl. Above all, share everything you think we need to know and show yourself. Projects you are proud of, your favorite hobby, successes… come on! And do you have any questions? Call us on +31 (0)6 11 49 17 69.Parttime uren: 24 per weekSoort dienstverband: Fulltime, Parttime, Bepaalde tijd, Onbepaalde tijdSalaris: €2.100,00 - €2.800,00 per maandAanvullende betalingen:VakantiegeldWerkschema:AvondwerkWeekendErvaring:Vergelijkbare: 1 jaar (Vereist)Opleiding:HBO (Aanbevolen)Locatie:Amsterdam (Aanbevolen)",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 2,health,Indeed,p_ba0df818ba244922,Test afnemer Hoorn,Health Tests  Supplies BV, Hoorn,"FunctieomschrijvingVerantwoordelijkhedenBen jij maatschappelijk betrokken en wil jij iets betekenen voor jouw medemens? Wil jij je steentje bijdragen tijdens de Corona crisis in de vorm van het afnemen van een test?Stop dan met zoeken, want wij zoeken jou!Wat ga je precies doen?Voor een NIEUW te openen Coronatest locatie in Hoorn en omgeving zoeken we jou! De locatie open per direct. Als testafnemer ben jij het gezicht van onze opdrachtgever.Jij bent samen met een assistent verantwoordelijk voor de afname van deze neus- en keeltesten en zorgt ervoor dat deze testen in goede orde aangeleverd worden aan het laboratorium.Daarnaast voer je de administratie uit m.b.t. de afgenomen testen. Ben je vanaf nu beschikbaar en heb je affiniteit met de zorg.Waar wacht je nog op? Kom bij ons aan boord en je kunt straks gaan helpen om Corona de wereld uit te helpen.Benodigde vaardighedenJe kunt mensen goed op hun gemak stellenGeen medische achtergrond? Overtuig ons dat je het toch kunt!Je hebt een vriendelijk voorkomenJe digitale skills zijn top!Werken bij Spoedtest.nlWe zijn een jong team die allemaal hard willen werken voor onze mensen.Wat bieden wij?Flexibiliteit met werk ureneen goede betalingveel zelfstandigheidSolliciteren : YES!! Ja, dit wil ik! Solliciteer dan nu razend snel via de site en wie weet wordt je direct gebeld door een nieuwe collega.Contractduur 3 maandenParttime uren: 40 per weekSoort dienstverband: Fulltime, Parttime, Bepaalde tijd, Freelance/ZZPSalaris: €11,00 - €15,00 per uurWerkschema:DagdienstWeekendThuiswerken:NeeVoorzorgsmaatregelen tegen het coronavirus:Op afstand solliciterenPersoonlijke beschermingsmiddelen worden uitgedeeld/zijn verplichtPlexiglas schermen op werkplekkenEr gelden richtlijnen voor social distancingEr zijn ontsmettings-, desinfecteer- of schoonmaakprocedures van kracht",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 3,health,Indeed,p_44a8d397ff3395f8,BARISTA NL Amsterdam,Starbucks, Amsterdam,"By bringing people together over coffee, Starbucks has become one of the world’s best-known and best loved companies. Working at Starbucks is a lot like working with your friends! When you work here, you’re not an “employee” – we call ourselves “partners” because we believe in shared common goals and mutual success. Our partners are our most valuable resource.

Did you always want to work as a Barista in Starbucks and are you interested to learn all about the different beverages that we make? Do you have an outgoing, positive “can do” attitude and you love face to face interactions? Than you are the perfect candidate!
Your job

A Starbucks Barista delivers legendary customer service to all customers by acting with the ‘customer comes first’ attitude and connecting with the customer. Discovers and responds to customer needs, provides quality beverages, whole bean, and food products consistently for all customers according to Starbucks’ recipe and presentation standards. Acts with integrity, honesty and knowledge that promotes the culture, values and mission of Starbucks.
Your responsibilities:
Communicating information to the store manager so that the team can respond as necessary to create the Third Place environment during each shift
Maintaining a calm demeanour during periods of high volume or unusual events to keep the store operating standard and to set a positive example for the shift team
Maintaining a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed
Contributing to a positive team environment by recognizing alarms or changes in partner morale and performance and communicating them to the store manager.
Recognizing and reinforcing individual and team accomplishments by using existing organizational methods
Following Starbucks operational policies and procedures, including those for cash handling and safety and security, to ensure the safety of all partners during each shift
Assisting with new partner training by positively reinforcing successful performance and giving respectful and encouraging coaching as needed
Maintaining regular and consistent attendance and punctuality
Following health, safety and sanitation guidelines for all products.
Your profile
Qualified candidates for a Barista position don’t need any previous experience. It is an asset if you do possess related experience.
Must haves:
You can speak conversational English and basic Dutch
You are flexible (no “9-5”, weekends off mentality)
Strong work ethic and results driven
Ability to learn quickly
Strong interpersonal skills
Ability to work as part of a team and to build relationships
Ability to understand and carry out oral and written instructions and request clarification when needed
A Dutch work permit.
Core Competencies
Puts the customer first and has a relentless focus on the customer.
Understands what the customer wants and how to best deliver the experience.
Works well with others, listens and communicates well with people within and outside of Starbucks.
Creates a team environment that is positive and productive and leads courageously.
Takes personal responsibility to do the right thing, and persists in times of challenge or uncertainty.
Adapts quickly to change and makes timely, thoughtful decisions
Develops continuously and achieves results.
Continuously seek opportunities to improve self and others. Leads with trust, honesty and commitment to hire, coach and develop partners to achieve their potential.
Understands what drives overall business success and is accountable to prioritize and deliver quality results.
Demonstrates knowledge of core products and processes to get results. Anticipates obstacles and takes action to prevent or minimize their impact.
What we offer you
€ 9,96- per hour (excluding 8% holiday pay)
Health insurance discount
Pension
A free bag of coffee per week
Discounts on all of our products
Free beverages while working
Additional 8% holiday pay
Commuter allowance (if you live more than 7.5KM from your store)
25 paid holiday days per calendar year (Full time)
150% pay when you work on a public holiday

You have the possibility to work part time.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=44a8d397ff3395f8&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=f88075d6c4718367&assa=17,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=44a8d397ff3395f8&fccid=a88e611ddef97571&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

4,health,Indeed,p_e3e5d0ec3c7563ec,Oliver Wyman - Entry Level Consultant - Amsterdam,Marsh and McLennan, Amsterdam Zuid,"About Us Oliver Wyman is a global leader in management consulting. With offices in 60 cities across 29 countries, Oliver Wyman combines deep industry knowledge with specialized expertise in strategy, operations, risk management, and organization transformation. The firm has more than 5,000 professionals around the world who work with clients to optimize their business, improve their operations and risk profile, and accelerate their organizational performance to seize the most attractive opportunities. Our work is marked by exceptional impact for our clients and we have earned a reputation for quality work and that is why we represent half of the top 500 global companies.
Why Join Us?

By consistently producing results, we have earned a reputation for quality work and attractive career opportunities. We are committed to developing the best talent, where your good ideas and hard work are rewarded. There are also extensive opportunities to allow career flexibility including: corporate externships, 10/11-month work years or sabbaticals, non-profit fellowships, and international staffing opportunities
A growing, entrepreneurial firm with exceptional economics
More client exposure on Day One and significant international opportunities
Developing the best talent, where your good ideas and hard work are rewarded
Attractive compensation for performance
A company that is committed to work-life balance and having fun
Extensive opportunities to allow career flexibility including: corporate externships, 10/11-month work years or sabbaticals, non-profit fellowships, and international staffing opportunities
The type of work we do
Our challenging Consultant position offers exceptional career growth and opportunity to motivated and hardworking graduates. As a Consultant you will:
Work in teams to solve high level business problems facing half of the top Global 500 clients
Structure and carry out essential research and analysis
Lead complex quantitative, strategic and financial analyses of corporations and businesses
Receive support to develop leadership and client management skills

Receive broad exposure to a variety of industries including: Automotive, Aviation, Communications, Financial Services, Energy, Health & Life Sciences, Media, Retail, Surface Transportation and Technology.
Who can apply

We look for initiative, intuition and creativity with a strong background in problem solving and analytics. We do not require a specific academic major or industry experience. One of the best things we can do for our clients and ourselves is to recruit a diverse group of people who bring a broad range of strengths and backgrounds to their roles.
How to apply
To be considered please submit CV and cover letter and transcript

Oliver Wyman is an equal opportunity employer and a wholly owned subsidiary of Marsh & McLennan Companies.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=e3e5d0ec3c7563ec&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=50212e188ca7200d&assa=1301,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=e3e5d0ec3c7563ec&fccid=d46039b952140fd4&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

Mitek is committed to the health and safety of our employees and candidates. During this current pandemic, our global team of Mitekians are successfully and productively working full-time from home. Your experience with us - from introduction, to interview, to onboarding - will be a virtual one.

6,health,Indeed,p_d8cdf388437bc7cb,"Groups, Meetings & Events Specialist","Marriott International, Inc", Amsterdam,"Posting Date Feb 04, 2021
Job Number 21009293
Job Category Sales & Marketing
Location Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel, Kattengat 1, Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands VIEW ON MAP
Brand Renaissance Hotels
Schedule Full-Time
Relocation? N
Position Type Non-Management

You were always one of those curious kids who opened every cabinet, peeked behind every door, and never ceased to ask ""why"" when given an explanation. Today, you bring your personal style to every experience. You live life to discover. You are passionate about your neighborhood, always looking to explore the places one wouldn’t find in a travel guide. If this sounds like you, you’re in the right place. You’ve got authentic style, natural curiosity and a warm way with people. Renaissance is not just a place to spend the night, it's a place to discover, a place in the world with style like yours. That’s why we’re not just looking for anyone. We’re looking for someone like you.
Discover this way!

Do you have a passion for hospitality and events? Would you like to work in a dynamic and innovative environment? Are you creative and always looking for new opportunities? The Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel is looking for a Groups, Meetings & Events Specialist!
What are my responsibilities?

As a Groups, Meetings and Events Specialist you will be responsible for handling and managing enquiries for the Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel, for Corporate Groups (10 bedrooms or more), local catering (Meetings or Events without or up to 10 bedrooms) and Corporate Meetings (Meetings or Events with 10 or more bedrooms) from the enquiry stage to the execution.

You serve as contact person for clients, vendors, and meeting or event planners and communicate with them by phone and e-mail to respond to questions and requests, and optimize revenue & utilization of meeting and event space as well as Event Satisfaction. You are responsible for all details for a perfect execution of the event. You prepare all documentation and coordinate with all departments and customers to ensure consistent, high level service throughout pre-event, event and post event phases of the events. You deal with reservation requests, no shows, changes, additional services and cancellations.

You will ensure all hotel events have a seamless turnover to our operational departments and act as a key-contact person for both the clients, as internally towards all hotel disciplines. On the day of the event you hand all information over to our Event Operations department. You are responsible for the highest level of service by leading and executing the requirements of events, based on Renaissance Event Management Standards.
What are we looking for?

We are looking for an ambassador who is creative and brings personal style to every event experience. You are an ambitious and experienced in handling events and are looking for a new opportunity to develop further your skills. You live life to discover and you have a natural curiosity and a warm way with people. Is this exactly who you are and what you want to do? We’re looking for someone like you!
To be eligible for this position you…
Live Life to Discover.
Have a degree in Hospitality Management or similar.
Have experience in Events and a passion for Hospitality and Lifestyle.
Have strong communication skills (verbal, listening, writing) and strong organization skills.
Speak English and preferably Dutch.
What do you get in return?

Renaissance Amsterdam hotel is part of Marriott International and offers a competitive salary and a wide package of benefits. Each year you will have a performance appraisal. Dependent on your performance you are able to get a salary increase or a one-time bonus. In addition we offer you…
A professional and stimulating work environment.
An international and dynamic team.
Personal coaching to support you in your day-to-day job and lots of development and training opportunities.
Special Associate Rate discount available for Marriott products worldwide.

A TakeCare program, which means you can participate in boot camp, apply for a gym against a discounted rate, sport in our own health club, follow dancing classes against a discounted rate and much more.
Career possibilities within Marriott International.
As part of our culture we celebrate recognition and organize many social activities, such as our Associates Appreciation Week, yearly Staff party and Team outing.

Marriott is an equal opportunity employer committed to employing a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=d8cdf388437bc7cb&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=04f1cb152ab1b88a&assa=3001,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=d8cdf388437bc7cb&fccid=d47acb5b5596d9e4&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
7,health,Indeed,p_2416ca2d3afd8607,Junior Consultant Health,THE DECISION GROUP, Amsterdam,"DATE September, 2020
SUBJECT Vacancy Junior Consultant Health
The Decision Group
Are you interested in the field of health and life sciences and looking for a challenging job
within a fast-learning organization? The position of business analyst at The Decision Group
might be the perfect job for you!
Join the pioneering strategy consulting firm The Decision Group: a company with a strong
focus on health care & life sciences. Deliver and help clients to focus on creating value by
using the most cutting-edge knowledge in the field of health and life sciences in our day-to-
day practice of consulting, doing research, and making executive education programs.
Business Analyst Health
We are looking for a full-time colleague who (minimally) has a master’s degree on a university
level and affinity with health and life sciences. You will team up with a consultant managing
multiple projects, from account management and client relations to educational projects which
involves taking a deep-dive into various healthcare. Together you will work on all aspects of a
project, ranging from client contact to marketing to small administrative tasks.
We are looking for someone with
1. Fluency in both Dutch and English
2. A master’s degree in the field of health & life sciences
3. Interest/affinity and preferably experience in:
a. Value-Based Health Care and Value-Based Health Care implementation
projects and education with a digital focus (a.o. e-health, data, AI)
b. Digital transformation and services/products (internally and for clients)
c. Business (a highly developed sense of commercialism and experience in
marketing/communication)
d. (Project) Management (planning skills, able to prioritize and work within
deadlines, keeping an overview in hectic surroundings)
e. Client relations and adding value for them
f. Willingness to work internationally
g. Consulting and change management experience or proven interest
4. The following competencies:
a. Positive and enthusiastic
b. Thorough
c. Hands-on mentality
d. Entrepreneurial and independent
5. Excellent skills in MS Office.
What we offer
1. Fast-learning by doing
2. Informal but professional and challenging surroundings
3. Critical feedback loops to get the most out of you
4. Working closely together in a team with great colleagues
5. Freedom and responsibility
column2: ‘head-first’, initiative and creativity

info@thedecisiongroup.nl or call +31 (0)20 4040 111 for more information.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=2416ca2d3afd8607&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=5ef4b51bd82cc0de&assa=4019,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=2416ca2d3afd8607&fccid=e4abeee5406b74c4&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

8,health,Indeed,p_fe49eea6edf1edb0,Bootcamp instructeur,City Bootcamp, Amsterdam,"Looking for STARS!City Bootcamp is een sportbedrijf met als missie om iedereen elke dag een beetje gezonder en gezelliger te maken. Mensen een beter leven geven. Dat doen we door onze Bootcamp Trainingen, door de inzet van health coach sterren en door de entertainer uit te hangen om mensen aan het lachen te maken. We zijn natuurlijk wel serieus, we hebben een berg aan fitness kennis in huis en dat willen we graag overbrengen. We maken gezondheid cool door een merk te bouwen dat creativiteit, energie en fun uitstraalt. Dit merk wordt door een awesome team als een pitbull bewaakt en met veel liefde uitgebouwd.Voor ons team in Amsterdam zijn wij op zoek naar BOOTCAMP TRAINERS. Ben je in het bezit van minimaal een Fitness A-diploma of soortgelijke certificaten? Ben je leergierig en enthousiast? Straal je passie en plezier uit? Kan jij je klanten op een verantwoorde manier uit blijven dagen? Ben jij die persoon die ervoor zorgt dat doelen worden behaald en mensen boven zichzelf uitstijgen? Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou!Wat wij vragen:Certificaten/diploma’s waarmee je officieel training mag geven

column1: 9,health,Indeed,p_48e13fa8135820f8,Health Safety & Environment Coordinator,Bunge, Wormerveer,"Ambieer jij een functie waarin je veel bewegingsvrijheid hebt en een van je uitdagingen het omhoog trekken van de procesveiligheid is? Werk jij graag voor een financieel stabiel en gezond bedrijf? Zou jij je tanden willen zetten in grote, interessante projecten die de organisatie qua veiligheid naar next level helpen? Lees dan snel de vacature Health Safety & Environment Coordinator en solliciteer direct!
Wat ga je doen als Health Safety & Environment Coordinator?

Als Health Safety & Environment Coordinator ben je verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering en borging van operationele activiteiten op het gebied van ARBO, veiligheid en milieu. Je ontwikkelt en implementeert bedrijfsstandaarden en procedures om als organisatie continu te blijven verbeteren. Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor rapportages aan zowel het management als de overheid.
Als Health Safety & Environment Coordinator heb je een veelzijdige functie en kun je o.a. denken aan de volgende werkzaamheden:
Het uitvoeren van diverse onderzoeken op de gebieden arbeidsveiligheid, procesveiligheid, arbeidshygiëne en milieu
column2: Het bijhouden van de Risico Inventarisatie en Evaluatie en het bijbehorende plan van aanpak
column3: Het fungeren als aanspreekpunt voor klanten en diverse externe instanties, waaronder overheden en certificerende organisaties
column4: Het geven van voorlichting op het gebied van ARBO, veiligheid en milieu en het trainen van medewerkers in veilig en milieuverantwoord handelen.

column1: Dagelijks zal je intensief samenwerken met diverse afdelingen zoals productie, logistiek, de technische dienst en het laboratorium om een efficiënte organisatie te bewerkstelligen die aan alle ARBO-, veiligheid- en milieu-eisen voldoet. Daarnaast heb je regelmatig contact met je Veiligheid & Milieu collega's en rapporteer je aan de Plant Manager Wormerveer.
Wat zegt jouw toekomstige Manager over deze rol?

De Health Safety & Environment Coordinator heeft een zeer zelfstandige functie in een leuk en hands on team. Binnen de Bunge kaders heb je de kans om internationaal collegiaal overleg te hebben. Heb je ideeën of plannen om zaken beter te laten lopen? Ik geef je alle ruimte voor verbetering! Er vinden diverse investeringen plaats om veiligheid binnen ons bedrijf naar een hoger plan te trekken.
Wat breng jij mee als Health Safety & Environment Coordinator?

Je bent een stevige persoonlijkheid, pro-actief en in staat anderen van jouw standpunten te overtuigen. Vanzelfsprekend ben je gedreven in je vak en weet je met je persoonlijkheid het HSE beleid uit te dragen. Daarnaast weet je op natuurlijke wijze te communiceren met diverse niveaus binnen de organisatie. Voor deze leuke rol zoeken wij een zelfstandige, oplossingsgerichte collega met een no-nonsense mentaliteit. Verder herken jij je in het volgende profiel:
Je hebt een diploma Hogere Veiligheidskunde (HVK)
column2: Je beschikt over 5 jaar relevante werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie binnen de (proces)industrie
column3: Je hebt goede en actuele kennis met betrekking tot de eisen op het gebied van kwaliteit, veiligheid en milieu
column4: Je bent bekend met de MS office pakketten en in het bijzonder ben je ervaren met Excel
column5: Je hebt een uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal, zowel in woord als geschrift.

column1: Wat mag jij van ons verwachten?
Een uitdagende functie met veel verantwoordelijkheid
column2: Een bedrijfscultuur waarbinnen het ontwikkelen van jezelf door middel van opleidingen wordt gestimuleerd
column3: Een platte organisatie met korte lijnen waarbinnen eigen initiatief wordt gewaardeerd
column4: Uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden: een premievrij pensioen, 25 vakantiedagen en een marktconform salaris.

column1: Over ons
Bunge Loders Croklaan is wereldwijd bekend als belangrijke producent en toeleverancier van zaden- en tropische oliën voor (inter)nationale industriële klanten.

In Nederland hebben we een productiefaciliteit in Wormerveer en een hypermoderne fabriek in Rotterdam. De raffinaderij op de Maasvlakte in Rotterdam is een voorbeeld van hoe innovatie en duurzaamheid kunnen samengaan. Ons hoofdkantoor is gevestigd in Wormerveer.
Belangstelling:
Heb je interesse in deze functie? Dan ontvangen wij graag je CV met een motivatie. Je kunt je sollicitatie sturen via de bijgevoegde link.
Nog niet direct overtuigd of meer weten?
Voor meer informatie over de functie kun je contact opnemen met Robbert Groenendijk, Talent Acquisition Specialist, op telefoonnummer 06 – 48 23 82 51, of per mail robbert.groenendijk@bunge.com.
Voor meer informatie over onze organisatie kun je terecht op onze website http://europe.bungeloders.com/

10,health,Indeed,p_bba3aae98bcaf12d,Boekhoudkundig medewerker Health/Keto Online (8 - 32 uur),Swiss Point Of Care," De Hoek, Hoofddorp","Ben je goed thuis in Exact. Voel je je thuis bij een snelgroeiende internationale internet/webshop handelsonderneming met B2B en B2C klanten in heel Europa? Heb je ervaring met webshops, online platformen als Amazon en Bol ? Heb je affiniteit met gezondheid, voeding en leefstijl? Wil je het verschil maken? Wil jij deel uitmaken van een jong, enthousiast, internationaal team dat mensen helpt met hun gezondheid?In deze rol doe je verschillende administratieve take, in- en verkoopadministratie en ondersteun je het management en het sales team met o.a. rapportages.Een uitdagende veelzijdige baan met voldoende doorgroeimogelijkheden.Wie ben je?Je hebt een passie voor gezondheid, leefstijl en voeding.Je bent commercieel, stressbestendig en je kunt makkelijk en snel schakelen.Je bent zelfstandig en gestructureerd.Je bent communicatief vaardig in Nederlands, Engels en Duits (mondeling en schriftelijk).Je hebt een “can-do” mentaliteit, proactief, doortastend, klantgericht.Je bent een aanpakker, je snapt dat niet alles tussen 9-5 kan.Je wilt deel uitmaken van een jong, enthousiast, dynamisch en energiek team, met kansen om te groeien.Je bent flexibel.Wie is SwissPointOfCare?Wij zijn een jong, snelgroeiend Zwitsers / Nederlands bedrijf. Onze missie is mensen te helpen weer controle te nemen over hun eigen gezondheid. “the insight inside” met betaalbare meters voor ketonen, cholesterol en glucose. “To be the best me you can be” met onze natuurlijke supplementen en onze academy.We bieden je een boeiende job in een jong, energiek team, met volop kansen om te groeien.Wat doet een ""Financieel administratief medewerker ""?Je ondersteunt het management en het sales team. Daarnaast werk je nauw samen met onze accountant en logistiek partner.inkoopadministratievoorraadbeheer op verschillende platformenorderverwerkingfacturatie(verkoop)analysesBTW aangifte NL en internationaalmaand-, kwartaal en jaarafsluitingrapportages opstellen incl. financial en marketing KPIsFunctie eisen: HBO/WO (bedrijfsadministratie, bedrijfseconomie, bedrijfskunde, accountancy of vergelijkbare kennis)Inhoudelijk boekhoudkundige kennis en je hebt ervaring met Exact en bent handig en snel met ExcelMinimaal 3 jaar relevante werkervaringAnalytisch en affiniteit met cijfersProactief en communicatief vaardigAls je enthousiast bent geworden na het lezen van deze informatie, kunnen wij niet wachten om jou te ontmoeten.Compensatie: We betalen een goed salaris en bieden goede groeimogelijkheden.Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Bepaalde tijd, Onbepaalde tijdSoort dienstverband: Parttime, Bepaalde tijd, Onbepaalde tijdWerkschema:ma-vrErvaring:administratie / boekhoud: 3 jaar (Aanbevolen)Opleiding:HBO (Vereist)Taal:Duits (Aanbevolen)Frans (Aanbevolen)Engels (Aanbevolen)Nederlands (Vereist)",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 11,health,Indeed,p_038658fd26407a1f,Manager Health and Fitness,High Five Health Promotion, Schiphol,"Ben jij de meest sportieve teamcoach van Nederland en omstreken?zo’n 300 deelnemers en 3 Fitnesscoaches wachten op jouw startschot!Het runnen van een bedrijfsfitnesslocatie is een uitdaging van bijna Olympische proporties. Een uitdaging die alleen kan worden overwonnen als alle teamleden weten wat hun bijdrage aan de vitaliteit van deelnemers is. En hoe ze die bijdrage steeds verder kunnen vergroten. Kun jij dat vermogen bij Fitnessinstructeurs en Fysiotherapeuten aanwakkeren? En combineer je die coachende kwaliteiten met een klantgerichte focus én het talent om op commercieel resultaat te sturen? Bij de gym op Schiphol The Base word je door jouw nieuwe team met high fives begroet!Onze nieuwe Manager Health and Fitness / Clubmanager bedrijfsfitness isiemand met een frisse visie op bedrijfsfitness anno nu. Je weet vandaag wat mensen morgen in beweging brengt en welke innovatieve behandelingen echt meerwaarde hebben. Bovendien kun je die inzichten met een gezonde dosis overtuigingskracht op teamleden overbrengen. Die vakinhoudelijke passie vul je aan met een commerciële mindset. Je bent dus iemand die weet dat opdrachtgever- en deelnemerstevredenheid keiharde voorwaarden zijn voor duurzaam succes. En kunt dat besef borgen binnen een team van fitnesscoaches. Daar hoort bij dat je scherpe finishlijnen in het zand durft te trekken en medewerkers kunt uitdagen targets te behalen. Ongeacht of het gaat om ledentallen, klanttevredenheid of financiële performance. Dat je energie krijgt van het begeleiden van cliënten (solo of in groepsverband) hoeven we eigenlijk niet te vermelden: jij ademt vitaliteit en vindt het fantastisch als deelnemers zich steeds beter voelen!Onze nieuwe Manager Health and Fitness/ Clubmanager heeftHBO werk- en denkniveau
column2: richting Sport of Management opleiding
column3: Personal Trainer diploma, zoals Fitnesstrainer B en/of NASM/LAPTMinimaal 2 jaar werkervaring als commerciële clubmanager Commerciële en salesvaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkelt (met aantoonbaar resultaat)Ervaring in het aansturen van een team op gebied van sales is een pré.Aantoonbare affiniteit met sport, vitaliteit, beweging en/of gezondheid. Actuele kennis van en ervaring in de (bedrijfs-) fitnessbranche is een pré
column4: Ervaring met groepslessen, bijvoorbeeld Cycle, Power, Pilates of YogaSterke communicatieve en coachende vaardigheden
column6: Beschikt over goede onderhandelingsvaardigheden en is in staat om gestelde doelen te realiseren
column7: Het vermogen om met andere samen te werken aan een gezamenlijke resultaat, een teamplayer
column8: Flexibiliteit in inzetbaarheid, denken en handelen
column9: Goede kennis van Engelse taal in woord en geschrift.Onze nieuwe Manager Health and Fitness/ Clubmanager krijgtdaar veel voor terug. Een fair salaris natuurlijk. Plus aantrekkelijke extra’s. High Five Health Promotion is een grote fitness- en vitaliteitsorganisatie. In Nederland. Maar ook in België, Duitsland en Engeland. Een internationaal speelveld dus. Met internationale voordelen, zoals inspirerende ontwikkelprogramma’s en goede reiskosten-, pensioen- en verzekeringsregelingen en lidmaatschap bij CultuurWerkt. Maar het mooiste is waarschijnlijk de kans zelf: je runt namelijk een ‘eigen’ bedrijfsfitnesslocatie die honderden mensen in beweging brengt.Over High Five Bij High Five geloven we dat een gezonde geest en een gezond lichaam de basis vormen van elke superwerknemer. In deze snelle, veeleisende wereld is het verlangen naar balans en persoonlijke gezondheid groter dan ooit. Met ons brede scala aan vitaliteitsservices inspireren we iedereen om de gemotiveerde, energieke, gefocuste, creatieve en gebalanceerde teamspeler te worden die de superwerknemer is.Sinds 1988 is High Five Health Promotion dé leverancier van bedrijfsfitness en -vitaliteit, met 54 on-site sportscholen in Nederland, Duitsland, België en het Verenigd Koninkrijk. Op basis van onze 4 pijlers
column10: High Five Gyms, High Five Fitness Network, High Five Health en High Five Progress brengen we dagelijks meer dan 400 bedrijven en meer dan 80.000 medewerkers in beweging.Wij geven bedrijven en medewerkers de kracht om alle doelen te bereiken.Jump on board and join the vitality movement.Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteldSoort dienstverband: FulltimeArbeidsvoorwaarden:PensioenReiskostenvergoedingWerkschema:ma-vr",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 12,health,Indeed,p_ae456637cbbe27c9,Health Promoter (closed),Artsen Zonder Grenzen, Amsterdam Centrum,"Job Brief
As a health promoter you will assess, define, implement and supervise all Health Promotion and Community Engagement (HPCE) activities in the project area.
Your job

As a health promoter you will assess, define, implement and supervise all Health Promotion and Community Engagement (HPCE) activities in the project area. These activities are aimed towards increasing the community’s knowledge on health (risks), improving current health practices, promoting MSF services and supporting preventive activities with community collaboration.

This will be achieved through outreach activities bridging project and targeted population, while respecting the culture and practices of different communities to optimize our information, education and communication strategies. You will analyze local culture, traditions and health perception to support the social mapping and adapt effective health practices while maintaining a strong link to our medical activities. Responsibilities also include developing and adapting our HP-material according your analyses to ensure relevance, adequacy and comprehension. As this is a supervising role, other crucial elements are recruitment, training, evaluation and development of the (local) HP staff of the project.
Requirements for Health Promoters
Bachelor or Master’s degree in Anthropology or Social Sciences, Health Promotion, Public Health, Global Health, International Relations, Social Communications and Nurse Specialisms
At least 6 months of professional and relevant 'hands-on' experience working in Health Promotion, education or prevention (i.e. HIV, SGBV) in resource poor communities
At least one year of management experience after certification
A strong command of the English language
The capacity to motivate and manage team members, guide staff development and identify training needs
Ability to cope with stress and to organize and prioritize workload
Willingness to work in an unstable and insecure environment
Availability of at least 9 months
Assets
MSc in Health Education and Promotion
Additional degrees/experience in graphic design, social marketing or educational design
Experience with community work
Knowledge of software like Photoshop, Moviemaker and Illustrator
Experience in qualitative research (such as surveys) is a plus
Work experience in an emergency setting
Previous experience with a similar non-governmental organization abroad
Fluency in French and/or Arabic language
Application process
PLEASE NOTE THAT WE ONLY TAKE UP APPLICATIONS THAT MEET ALL OF THE ABOVE REQUIREMENTS
The following documents will be requested in the application process:
Your most recent English CV not exceeding 3 pages
A cover letter explaining your motivation to work with MSF
A clear scan of your relevant diploma’s and certificates

If you are currently working for MSF as national staff or have done so up until a year ago, we require that you upload a recommendation letter for expatriation from your HRCo, Head of Mission or other staff in a coordinating position and include two of your most recent MSF evaluations

In MSF we are strongly committed to professionalism and responsible behaviour and therefore the final phase of the application process is a background screening. Such screening can consist out of an identity check, check of employment history, reference check and declaration on behaviour (VOG).",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=ae456637cbbe27c9&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=8a588bbec8aa14fb&assa=9793,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=ae456637cbbe27c9&fccid=13063f00f1d9030a&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

13,health,Indeed,p_a635487a9d872d45,Mental Health and Psychosocial Support (MHPSS) Advocacy Officer,HealthNet TPO, Amsterdam,"Join us as a Mental Health and Psychosocial Support (MHPSS) Advocacy OfficerWhat do we do at HealthNet TPO?We are professional and passionate organization with strong national teams working in our project countries, and a small and cost-efficient support office in Amsterdam.For the past 27 years, we have been working in a fragile environments characterized by violence, conflict and a constant degree of insecurity. We help where people are facing the immense task of rebuilding society while they suffer from poverty, diseases and the emotional consequences of conflict. Currently we have field offices in Afghanistan (since 1993), in South Sudan (since 1995), in Burundi (since 2000) and in Colombia where local teams are working together with communities, health workers and government stakeholders.Our mission is to strengthen communities, help them to regain control and maintain their health and wellbeing, while at the same time strengthening national health care systems to ensure health needs are met. Our community interventions engage local people with local knowledge, and we believe that even the most vulnerable people have the inner strength to (re) build a better future for themselves.Even if countries rebuild their communities, systems and economies and memories of conflict will fade, there is an enduring need to address MHPSS in fragile environments. HealthNet TPO has a longs standing track record in designing and providing MHPSS solution in conflict countries. In the years to come we aim to further strengthen our efforts to provide MHPSS support in fragile environments. HealthNet TPO intends to increase its efforts to advocate for models of mental health that incorporate peer support and supported decision-making, alongside systematic interventions to increase the quality of health services and foster community cohesion. These interventions have shown to have positive effects on mental health and well-being.What are we looking for?We are looking for a motivated, enthusiastic and result-oriented team player who will work with us to advocate for the importance of integrating MHPSS into development programs. In addition, we are looking for a MHPSS professional who has a great interest in communication and representation and who will support the organization and its teams to carry forward its profile and programs regarding MHPSS. Last but not least we are looking for a colleague who is able to take the lead in keeping the technical oversight and support to the Women, Peace and Security programs which are going to be implemented in South Sudan and Colombia.Your profile You should be able to convey HealthNet TPO's ideas and complex concepts to others by adapting languages and terminology appropriately to the needs of the audience. We ask you to have proven experience in representation and advocacy within an international organization. In addition, it is an advantage if you were to have experience in conducting institutional and policy analysis as well as drafting policy and briefing documents in relevant fields.In order to be able to fulfill your role as MHPSS Advocacy Officer you preferably have a Master's degree in Psychology or similar related post-graduate degree. It is equally important that you have a good understand on how to place MHPSS into the wider Public Health perspective. Excellent English and Spanish oral and writing skills are a must (French and Dutch are an advantage).Your role: Your role will be strongly connected to program activities from which data is derived that will give input to knowledge sharing and operational research. There is a direct link to two projects funded under the Women, Peace and Security call of the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Colombia and South Sudan. Moreover, your role will seek to strengthen HealthNet TPO's existing position in the field of MHPSS in line with the organizational track record and strategic plan. This will be done via participation in (inter) national working groups and through further development of organizational interventions in MHPSS.Your tasks include:Facilitate and guide the organization's lobby and advocacy strategy on MHPSS at the national and international level.Actively contribute to the dissemination of HealthNet TPO's activities and experiences via off- and online channels by developing publications, guidelines and communication materials.Support in developing strategic partnerships with key actors to achieve our policy goals and fundraising regarding policy interventions.Coordinate the Women, Peace and Security learning agenda and lead international lobby and advocacy for the programs in South Sudan and Colombia.Give support to project development, implementation and mainstreaming MHPSS policies and interventions within the organization.Advise and support country offices to carry out lobby and advocacy actions.Support the development and systematisation of guidelines, training manuals and other materials related to area of expertise.Strive to ensure that strategies and interventions are evidence-based and implemented in a comprehensive and cost-effective manner.Drive knowledge-exchange between various field locations and between the field and support office in Amsterdam.Represent the organization in fora like IASC, WHO and others in the area of MHPSS, and participate in relevant meetings connected to the Women, Peace and Security programs.Support strategy development of the organization (Annual Plan, Mid-Term Policy) on area of expertise.Contribute to the development of organizational strategies and policies on area of expertise.Contribute and participate in monitoring, evaluation and learning.If needed, provide on-going support and technical assistance to specific programs.Work closely with head office colleagues to ensure alignment with operations, communication and policy development according to the organizational strategy for 2019-2023.You have / are: Education .Master's degree in Psychology or similar related post-graduate degree.ExperienceAll round mental health and psychosocial support expert, with a good understanding of global issues in the field of Public Health.At least 5 years relevant work experience preferably with experience in representation, lobby and advocacy within an international organization.Relevant knowledge in the area of Women, Peace and Security, gender equality, and women's empowerment.Previous experience with multi-year Dutch-funded programs is an advantage.Experience with participation in high-level dialogues, consultations, workshops including with members of Parliament, government, CSOs, etc.Proven experience in conducting institutional and policy analysis, drafting policy and briefing documents in relevant fields is an advantage.Previous experience and knowledge of operating contexts in countries HealthNet TPO is implementing programs is an advantage.Experience and proven skills in aspects of Project Management including the utilization of tools such as Logical Framework, PCM, M&E framework and Theory of Change.Excellent English and Spanish oral and writing skills (French and Dutch are an advantage).Ambition, drive and passion to further develop and champion effective practices in the area of expertise throughout the organization.Specific SkillsExcellent communication and presentation skills, can convey ideas and complex concepts to others adapting the language and terminology appropriately to the needs of the audience.Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to work well with others.Good organization skills.Good conceptual and analytical skills and ability to think and operate innovatively.We offer: You will become part of the small, passionate, dynamic operations team in Amsterdam.We offer a full-time position based in the Amsterdam with frequent travel also to conflict affected areas. Working with HealthNet TPO will give you a unique opportunity to work with people from different cultural and professional backgrounds.We would like to welcome you on board as from the 02/15/2021.More information?Should you be interested to join our team in Amsterdam then send your CV and application letter / motivation, ( maximum 2 pages each document).When applying, include the following title in the email subject line: MHPSS Advocacy Officer.Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled.Candidates should be an EU citizen or otherwise be in a possession of a working permit to work in an EU country and preferably based in the Netherlands. Contractduur 12 maandenDeadline sollicitaties: 12-2-2021Verwachte startdatum: 15-2-2021Job Types: Full-time, ContractExperience:counseling: 5 years (Required)Education:Master's (Required)Location:Amsterdam (Preferred)Language:English, Spanish (Required)Work Remotely:No",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 14,health,Indeed,p_407a4ffb5fe4de0a,Stagiair(e) Strategy & Operations - Health,KPMG, Amstelveen,"Als stagiair binnen onze Strategy & Operations - Health afdeling werk je als volwaardig lid van een hecht en jong team aan strategische opdrachten voor onder andere zorgaanbieders, zorgverzekeraars, overheden, farmaceutische bedrijven en patiënten in binnen- en buitenland. Startdatum: 1 april of 1 september.
Jouw uitdagingen
Wil jij ervaring opdoen in strategie consulting?
Heb jij een passie voor de zorg?
Houd je ervan om complexe vraagstukken op te lossen?
Wil jij impact maken door de zorg te verbeteren?
Ben jij een enthousiaste en leergierige teamspeler?
Dit neem jij mee
Je studeert (bij voorkeur Masterfase) in een beleidsmatige, economische, bedrijfskundige of medische richting
Je hebt bovengemiddelde studieresultaten
Je bent analytisch en conceptueel sterk
Je beschikt over probleemoplossende vaardigheden
Je bent minimaal 4 dagen in de week beschikbaar, voor een periode van minimaal 3 maanden
Je staat ingeschreven op de universiteit
Wat ga jij doen als
Stagiair(e) Strategy & Operations - Health?

Strategy & Operations - Health is een ambitieus team binnen KPMG. Onze adviseurs werken aan uitdagende en uiteenlopende opdrachten binnen de zorgsector. Dagelijks begeleiden wij (internationale) klanten bij strategische vraagstukken, het (meten en) verbeteren van de prestaties en het beheersbaar maken van (financiële) risico's.
Met elke opdracht streven wij ernaar om samen impact te maken in de zorg. Dat is waar wij ons hard voor maken.""

Als stagiair werk je vanaf dag één mee aan onze opdrachten. Je bent een volwaardig lid van het projectteam en draait mee op voornamelijk een internationale opdracht in het herontwerpen van het zorgsysteem en het opzetten van een nationale zorgverzekering. Op deze manier leer je het vak, de markt, het team en KPMG goed kennen. Daarnaast ga je ontzettend veel leren om zo met een vliegende start aan je carrière te beginnen.
Houd er rekening mee dat wij alleen de sollicitaties in procedure nemen die wij via de website hebben ontvangen en dat wij op basis van ""first come, first serve"" werken.
Dit bieden wij
Intensieve begeleiding door een KPMG collega
Werkervaring opdoen in de consultancy én in de zorgsector
Sociale, sportieve en maatschappelijke activiteiten met collega's
Een ruime stagevergoeding
Vakantiedagen
Flexibele werkomgeving en een eigen laptop
Strategie consulting
Zorginhoudelijke ontwikkeling
Persoonlijke ontwikkeling
(Werk)sessies met projectteam en/of klant
Voorbereiden van presentaties en schrijven van rapportages

Data verzamelen en analyseren",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=407a4ffb5fe4de0a&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=bb1faaeb243b0b41&assa=1624,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=407a4ffb5fe4de0a&fccid=2dd390c3a48a7ed0&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
15,health,Indeed,p_5ce16ff5eae3900d,Medical Advisor,LEO Pharma, Amsterdam,"Company Description
At LEO Pharma , we are at a pivotal point in our transformation journey to advancing medical dermatology by developing new biologics, in a mostly unexplored therapeutic area in the world today.

Every day, we seek inspiration from people living with skin diseases. We are passionate about identifying and addressing their greatest health needs, to both advance medical dermatology and help them live fulfilling lives.

Our aspirations are to create an impact through our dermatology expertise and to enhance lives of skin diseases patients. These inspirations are encapsulated in our perpetual quest for the best talent.
Job Description

Are you ready to pioneer together with us? We are looking for a Medical Advisor to join our Scientific Affairs team in Benelux that has the official headquarter in Lier, Belgium. The individual in this position will be taking over the responsibilities for the Netherlands.
Working at Leo:
You will be part of a collaborative and innovative community of like-minded specialists connected by mutual respect
column2: a caring culture
column3: and our deep-rooted commitment to advancing the progress of biologic solutions with skins diseases worldwide. Driven by dedication, ambition and agility, we apply our deep knowledge in dermatology and a focus on long-term results.

column1: About your team:

You will join a highly motivated team - competing with the biggest pharmaceutical brands - inspiring one another with bold new ideas, expertise and knowledge to surpass our current size and reputation. With each step of the journey, you will see the impact of your contributions as we flourish and transform into a global leader in medical dermatology.
About the Job:

As Medical Advisor for our Innovative Portfolio you will have a key role in building a scientific credibility of LEO in the biologic market with KEE. Contributing to the development of medical strategy and providing medical input into brand strategies, you will ensure support of the life cycle of the products. You will serve as a role model for your peers, supervisors, and for the entire Leo community, enjoying in finding innovative ways for providing solutions for our patients.
Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate as key member of cross functional team Medical/Marketing/Market access in the local brand plan development

Responsible for translating the global medical strategy into the local medical plan, provide medical guidance along the life cycle of the products executing the medical component of the Brand Strategy
Responsible for the definition of specific medical plans, publication plans, protocols to ensure KEE/KOL and Stakeholder advocacy aligned with the overall global brand plans.
Lead the management of IIS, phase IV clinical studies ensuring proper documentation, contracts, oversight, payments, drug shipments and logistics
Accountable for the investments in the single studies according to the available budget
column2: deals with competence budget planning and with monitoring its respective expenses

column1: Contribute to the development, attend and present at appropriate meetings (advisory board meetings, investigator meetings, KEE/KOL meetings, CME, LEO meetings, etc.)

Develop and maintain up-to-date knowledge of the therapeutic areas by reviewing the literature, discussions with Key Opinion Leaders and key stakeholders, participating in cross functional interactions, attending scientific congresses, etc.
Develop and maintain a good working relationship and interact directly with all relevant LEO stakeholders at Regional & Global level to understand global medical strategy and act accordingly.

Accountable of delivering appropriate training in all relevant functions (field force and marketing mainly) to ensure a high knowledge of the therapeutic, scientific and product area in order to sustain the superiority and safety profile of our products.
Review promotional materials and documents for medical accuracy and compliance with applicable guidelines and regulations.
Qualifications
About you:
University degree, preferably in Health Sciences
3-5 years' experience with scientific affairs or /and sales/marketing in the pharmaceutical industry including people management experience gained in a global organization
Dermatology experience or relevant biologic product.
Strong leadership foundation from a scientific environment - supporting sales with scientific affairs
Demonstrate ability to engage and communicate effectively and support customers to drive excellent results
Fluent in Dutch and English is a must
Additional Information

16,health,Indeed,pj_6109d99fefeb8762,Objectbeveiliger advocatenkantoor,DB The Facility Group, Amsterdam,"Top Locatie
Amsterdam

Wij zijn op zoek naar een beveiliger/Security Host. Als jij voor ons werkt, dan is dat vrijwel altijd in een representatieve beveiligingsfunctie. Eén waarin jij servicetaken - zoals een ultieme ontvangst van gasten - combineert met security, health & safety activiteiten. En waar jij proactief op zoek naar een optimale dienstverlening op zoek gaat.
De locatie:

Het betreft hier een advocatenkantoor gevestigd aan de Zuidas. Hierbij staat de dienstverlenend zijn op nummer 1, en wordt een hoge dienstverlening geleverd. Het is een gerenommeerd kantoor, met een luxe en modern pand. Jij gaat samenwerken met de Hospitality Host, en zorgt samen voor een 5 star experience.
Een greep uit jouw takenpakket:
Creëren van een ultieme eerste indruk, een ultieme beleving die men niet snel vergeet!
Verwelkomen, ontvangen, informeren en doorverwijzen van alle gasten en leveranciers
Openen en sluiten van het pand en het uitvoeren van brand- en sluitrondes
Beoordelen van meldingen (alarm, brand, storingen) en het nemen van de juiste maatregelen
Signaleren van verbeteringen in processen en procedures
Wij zoeken hier iemand voor een dag/avond locatie, hierbij worden geen nacht en weekend diensten gevraagd.
DIT BEN JIJ:
EPIC. Energiek. Puur. Inspirerend. Connecting
Je bent gastvrij en hebt een professionele werkhouding
Uiteraard ben je in het bezit van een diploma Beveiliger 2
Je hebt uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden in het Nederlands en Engels
Een leuke collega
Enthousiast, flexibel en representatief zijn termen die op jou van toepassing zijn.
DIT KRIJG JIJ VAN ONS:

Veel persoonlijke aandacht en waardering. Bij ons ben jij geen ‘nummer’. Wij organiseren regelmatig teammeetings, leuke uitjes en een jaarlijks feest voor alle D&B-ers en zorgen er hiernaast met ons Security team voor dat wij altijd voor jou klaar staan en bereikbaar zijn
Werken bij toonaangevende opdrachtgevers waar je je kunt ontwikkelen
Je komt bij ons in dienst op een urencontract, met uitzicht op een onbepaalde tijd contract
Salaris met onregelmatigheidstoeslag
Maatkleding ontworpen door couturier Mart Visser
Sportabonnement vergoeding ter waarde van maximaal 35,- euro (bruto) per maand
Diverse trainingen, waaronder:
Proactieve Threat Assessment: een gastgerichte beveiligingsmethode om, door middel van slimme interventie, mogelijke criminele activiteiten al in de voorbereidingsfase te herkennen en te stoppen
Conflicthantering
Bedrijfshulpverlening.
De juiste balans tussen jouw wensen en de mogelijkheden binnen onze organisatie.
KOFFIE?
Herken jij jezelf in de bovenstaande vacature? Schroom dan niet en stuur mij jouw cv en dan spreken wij elkaar snel! Uiteraard ben ik ook te bereiken via telefoon en Whatsapp.
Groet,
Jules Eichhorn - Recruiter bij D&B - 06 - 11 39 92 71
Een screening en/of online assessment kan deel uitmaken van de selectieprocedure.

Job Description

Are you up for the challenge? Apply now! You'll be rewarded with global career opportunities, constant learning and development. We offer you the opportunity to be part of a highly successful and highly ethical company that is making a difference.
About PepsiCo

PepsiCo products are enjoyed by consumers more than one billion times a day in more than 200 countries and territories around the world. PepsiCo generated more than $67 billion in net revenue in 2019, driven by a complementary food and beverage portfolio. This portfolio includes a wide range of enjoyable foods and beverages, including 23 brands that generate more than $1 billion each in estimated annual retail sales.

Guiding PepsiCo is our vision to Be the Global Leader in Convenient Foods and Beverages by Winning with Purpose. ""Winning with Purpose"" reflects our ambition to win sustainably in the marketplace and embed purpose into all aspects of the business. For more information, visit www.pepsico.com.

It is also day to day accountable for the performance KPI’s: yield, waste,seasoning and oil efficiency.

18,health,Indeed,p_36865010bfca6667,"Junior Coverage Marketing Support, Client Onboarding and Due Diligence",Socit Gnrale, Amsterdam,"Responsibilities

Reporting directly to the coverage team in charge of the financial clients in the Netherlands, the VIE will be a key member of the clients coverage team, supporting their efforts to deliver the highest level of diligence regarding Know Your Customer (“KYC”) procedures along with the preservation of the clients’ relationships.

The position consists in supporting the financial coverage team in the enforcement of the internal KYC procedures, collecting documents and information required from clients to deliver them to the KYC analysts in a timely manner and with rigor, to ensure the smooth processing of the KYC reviews. This position entails (i) client contacts on the one hand and (ii) internal contacts to achieve the reviews.
Your Role:
Communicate effectively with front office, KYC teams and clients to obtain documentation
Updating internal databases and spreadsheets where applicable (including the scanning and archiving of documents)
Reconciles data and information as reported in the systems, proposes systems improvements and reports technical problems
Capacity to work on specific projects which may rise from time to time
Profile required
Graduate with a Master degree from Business school or University, majoring in Economics/Finance or Law
Ideally an experience similar to the position
Fluent in English
Proficient in Office application (data filtering, vlookups and pivot tables)
To facilitate the examination of your application by our English-speaking managers, we thank you for applying in English.
The VIE assignment in a nutshell
This VIE in Amsterdam is to begin as soon as possible but you need to plan 3 months between your application date and the beginning of your VIE assignment. It will last 12 months.

The VIE is a specific contract, under Business France’s eligibility criteria, opened to candidates under 28 and from the member states of the European Economic Space. Please see www.civiweb.com, in order to have more details regarding your financial indemnities.

We would like to draw your attention to the fact that your VIE mission could potentially get postponed, depending on the evolution of the health crisis and subjects to the decision made by the Crisis and Support Centre of the Ministry of Europe and Foreign Affairs (MEAE). In addition, the selected candidate will only be paid upon confirmation from Business France and arrival in the country of assignment.
Why join us

As soon as you arrive, you will be integrated into our teams and will learn every day alongside our experts, who will support you in your tasks. Gradually, you will become more independent in your projects, making this experience a real career accelerator. You will also discover all the diversity of our businesses, in a sector that is constantly evolving and innovating.
At the end of your VIE, various opportunities could be offered to you, in France and abroad.
Business insight
At Societe Generale, we are convinced that people are drivers of change, and that the world of tomorrow will be shaped by all their initiatives, from the smallest to the most ambitious.

Whether you’re joining us for a period of months, years or your entire career, together we can have a positive impact on the future. Creating, daring, innovating and taking action are part of our DNA.
If you too want to be directly involved, grow in a stimulating and caring environment, feel useful on a daily basis and develop or strengthen your expertise, you will feel right at home with us!
Still hesitating?

You should know that our employees can dedicate several days per year to solidarity actions during their working hours, including sponsoring people struggling with their orientation or professional integration, participating in the financial education of young apprentices, and sharing their skills with charities. There are many ways to get involved.

We are an equal opportunities employer and we are proud to make diversity a strength for our company. Societe Generale is committed to recognizing and promoting all talents, regardless of their beliefs, age, disability, parental status, ethnic origin, nationality, sexual or gender identity, sexual orientation, membership of a political, religious, trade union or minority organisation, or any other characteristic that could be subject to discrimination.
Reference: 210001PC
Entity: SG CIB
Starting date: 2021/04/01

20,health,Indeed,p_2ee89c6a36c05091,Urban Outfitters - Display Coordinator,Urban Outfitters, Amsterdam,"JOB TITLE: DISPLAY COORDINATOR
REPORTS TO: STORE MANAGER
JOB PURPOSE

Under guidance from the head office creative team, effectively communicate all display directives both in the windows and in stores across multiple stores and support in delivering a customer experience that is inspiring, dynamic and entertaining for our customers. Partner with the Visual Coordinator to deliver seasonal layouts and display schemes that set the highest possible standard for creative excellence across stores from planning to execution in each store.
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Interpret company direction and updates to ensure displays create an artistic, visionary and unique environment that has a positive impact on sales.
Utilise company direction to interpret the inspiration of the floor set by using knowledge of the customer and store location while introducing artistic and cultural interests.
Ensure excellent craftsmanship throughout all windows and in-store displays both in 3D and 2D art layering.
Actively seek outside inspiration and apply personal talent to develop and contribute unique perspectives to the overall display concept.
Communicate new inspiration ideas through to the Head Office through photo inspiration packs on a quarterly basis.
Consistently collaborate with the Visual Coordinator and Store Manager resulting in innovative and timely project execution.
Efficiently utilise all display materials, including adaptations, from recycled displays.
Keep work areas organised and clean, with an emphasis on customer and employee safety.
Ensure health and safety standards are upheld in the store in terms of displays and materials/tool management.
Maintain an organised display rooms at all times.
Ensure monthly display budgets are met and company purchasing card policy is adhered to at all times and completed within the cycle period set out by the company.
Prioritise and plan all projects to ensure that the customer experience is not inhibited.
Builds community relationships that directly reflect the urban culture.
REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
A strong artistic background which can have included art and design or architectural and 3D set design building.
Possess excellent carpentry skills and a good knowledge of power tool usage.
Talented and interested in the all aspects of creative elements including art and design.
Ability to communicate effectively and possess strong organisational skills.
Possess good project and time management skills.
A willingness to travel and be away from a home store for periods of time.
Artistic and design related background preferred but not essential.

Daarnaast help je ons door een (nieuw) Marketing Automation platform te implementeren.

Je komt terecht bij ons Marketing team dat bestaat uit een Teamleider Marketing en een marketing medewerker. Je vindt het leuk om een professionaliseringsslag te maken door jouw kennis en ervaring met online marketing.

Je bent analytisch sterk en ziet verbetermogelijkheden.

Bruto maansalaris van maximaal EUR 3.000,- bruto (hoogte salaris is afhankelijk van ervaring) o.b.v. 38 uur p.w.

22,health,Indeed,p_69e3aeb7c8c1f3fc,Junior Compliance Officer,TMF Group, Amsterdam,"Job purpose

As a Junior Compliance Officer you are responsible for maintaining client acceptance files (CDD) . You will maintain charters and policies based on identified regulatory, legal, strategic, operational and other changes and findings, and develop and provide trainings on these. The Compliance Officer executes the monitoring program, including review and administration on client acceptance files and reporting.
Tasks & Responsibilities
Maintain client acceptance files (CDD) and advise management on the (re-) acceptance of clients, including:
Consult with TMF Group Compliance on the advice regarding the (re)acceptance of clients
Monitor/review the periodically review of client entities
Manage (the administration on) the Compliance Netherlands workload
Maintain and update the database on client acceptance files
Contribute to the audit of clients and client entities
Execute monitor programs including:
Monitoring on transaction monitoring
Your profile
Master degree in Dutch Law or solid relevant professional experience. Certified as Compliance Officer is an advantage
1-2 years experience in Compliance
Familiarity with WTT, Wwft, Sanction law.
Knowledge of compliance and integrity
Knowledge or interest in trust services and its related business, corporate and tax laws is an advantage

Teamwork: an environment where we learn from our mistakes and work together to improve our processes continuously. A no-blame culture where teamwork is important, valued and lived daily.

Ambition: we are a growing company in which we constantly look for the next opportunity and where all ideas are welcome.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=69e3aeb7c8c1f3fc&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=4f404be012ca019c&assa=3420,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=69e3aeb7c8c1f3fc&fccid=407208a60bfc4c49&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

23,health,Indeed,p_65cc1f466815e387,Conversion Specialist,albelli, Amsterdam Centrum,"Do you have great interpersonal skills with the ability to explain and present insights and make your team more enthusiastic about data and experimentation? Do you want to work for a growing eCommerce company with ambitious goal? Wherever you are in the world, we will happily help you with relocation right to the center of Amsterdam. Get in touch, we might have a great role for you!
Purpose

As a Conversion Specialist / Analyst at albelli you will analyze and optimize experience of the albelli photo product editors which include online and downloadable editors as well as a mobile app. You will bring an understanding of web analytics and conversion rate optimization and translate it into stunning user experience leading to commercial benefits.

You will significantly contribute to the data driven product development by translating data into actionable insights, communicating them to the team, and proactively driving the A/B testing process. You will present your findings to your product owner, conversion specialists, and other stakeholders.

You will work with in-house UI/UX designers, copywriters, developers, and analysts to get most out of our data with the use of variety of tools. The role is highly influential and you will be able to validate your data driven hypotheses on real visitors and customers.

You will have a chance to exchange experience with other talented conversion specialists and analysts. As a professional willing to learn, you are encouraged to join relevant conferences and meetups. All that in an open environment which gives you flexibility and also room for making mistakes.
Responsibilities:
Define KPI’s for photo product editor performance and experiments
Proactively identify opportunities for improvements, using data and research
Create hypotheses for experiments
Cooperate with the team to build prototypes
Setup experiments independently or with developers
Monitor, evaluate experiments and present recommendations
Coach and educate your team and the business about the data and experimentation.
Requirements:
Minimum of 3 years of related work experience
Hands-on experience with conversion optimization
Research driven mindset and passion to work with data
Experience with analytics / user feedback tools such as Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Hotjar, Usabilla etc.
Experience with A/B testing tools such as Adobe Target, Visual Website Optimizer, Google Optimize, Optimizely etc.
Basic knowledge of SQL, ideally basic experience with R (or the interest to learn)
Knowledge of UX principles and best practices.
We offer
A fast-growing e-commerce environment
An international office hosting over 40 nationalities
Competitive compensation, relocation support and lots of benefits
A social atmosphere (lunch, Friday drinks, parties, sports, etc.). To be resumed Post COVID-19!
An informal, fun and driven culture
A central location in one of Europe’s most vibrant cities, Amsterdam!
COVID-19 update

For the safety of our employees and following the measures implemented due to COVID-19, we currently work differently. Our Amsterdam and Nijmegen offices are closed while our production facility in the Hague is operating with proper safety and health measures. Our Recruiting process is currently entirely remote via phone and video calls. Our new hires will have a remote onboarding since the well-being of our employees is our number one priority. For the time being, most of you will be working from home until further notice. This situation can change at any time.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=65cc1f466815e387&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=f54551fb424584d7&assa=3975,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=65cc1f466815e387&fccid=e8cf12a928a613d1&vjs=3,4 dagen geleden,4 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
