101,health,Indeed,p_c95eddbe51844b12,"Global Regulatory CMC Consultant – Cell and Gene Therapies, 1 year + contract, Home Working",ADV Talent Partners, Gemeente Haarlemmermeer,"Job Description
We are recruiting for a Global Snr Manager Regulatory Affairs CMC / Consultant to work on Cell and Gene Therapy products in development.

This is a unique opportunity. The contract will be over 12 months with a good possibility of an extension. The role will be based in the Netherland and you will be required to travel over a couple of times per month (post Covid-19), unless living close by. Until then you will be working from home.
What is the job?

The grade is Snr Manager Regulatory Affairs CMC and this role will give you the opportunity to work on projects in early to late stage of development – Cell Therapy, Gene Therapy and potentially one mAb
This will be a Global role covering the EU, US and depending on experience Japan
This will be a hands on role where you will write/author and review Regulatory CMC documentation (IMPD/IND, Module 3)

However, you will also play a key role in the Regulatory Affairs CMC department, where in collaboration with an experienced GRL you will be responsible for the development and implementation of the Regulatory CMC strategy and planning for assigned NMEs/NBEs
You will be the subject matter expert and act independently as the RA CMC lead or deputy leader on complex projects.
Who is right for the job?
4 + years of Regulatory Affairs CMC Biologics experience. Especially in development. Previous experience in analytical development, process development or bio manufacturing will be an advantage
You would have worked in a Regulatory CMC function, authoring and re-authoring IMPD/INDs and Module 3 for Cell & Gene Therapies, ATMPs, mAbs
Experience in direct communication with the Health Authorities on CMC matters
Positive, can do attitude with good communication as well as project management skills.
In return you will earn a competitive rate working for a global, R&D driven company for 12 + months and have the flexibility to work remotely.
Interested in the above? I look forward to hearing from you!
To Apply!

To apply for this role, please press the red “Apply for position” button, or contact me Oli Dimitrov on +44 (0)207 801 3388 or Theo Moore on +44 (0)207 801 3384 in full confidence to receive more details on this role or to hear about other available opportunities in Regulatory Affairs.

We provide a high level of service because we believe this matters. Our people place individuals at the Specialist, Expert, Regional and Global Head levels, so if you want some advice on when or how to make your next step, or to understand what that next step might look like, let’s collaborate and explore these ideas with each other. ADV Talent Partners only advertise around 30% of our active roles, so for us to really help you, please Register or call us. We provide permanent and contract roles in the following areas, across the USA, Europe and Asia Pacific. General switchboard number +44 (0)207 801 3380.

GDPR & Data Protection: Your information is safeguarded for GDPR, and you will have the right to edit, amend or delete and ’’be forgotten’’ at any time after your initial registration.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=c95eddbe51844b12&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=a89f4939082b09e9&assa=808,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=c95eddbe51844b12&fccid=f94f2fe19869476a&vjs=3,27 dagen geleden,27 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
102,health,Indeed,p_a802a16615c1ef4b,Creative Content Lead,Dept, Amsterdam,"We are looking for a Creative Content Lead to join our growing team in Amsterdam!

Dept is fast becoming one of the world's most successful agencies. To that end, we work with a team of smart and fanatical creatives for the best, most notorious and most loved brands. Does this sound exciting to you? We promise you it is! But you only really experience that when you start working for us. Are you the nation's best creative lead who wants to make the most progressive work with us? Then we will prepare the (digital) coffee in advance.
For this role we are looking for someone with fluent Dutch and English.

We are looking for a creative lead with extensive experience whose hands itch. He/she understands that people are not always waiting for advertising and therefore want to shake the foundations of the Netherlands and surroundings with his or her concepts. These concepts range from innovative social media to live stunts and from online video formats to guerrilla ideas. Everything is allowed for you to create content that doesn’t feel like advertising at all. Someone who tackles all creative space with both hands, but also knows how to inspire and guide our club of creatives. We are looking for someone who doesn't care about awards, but is secretly a little proud that there are a few to his or her name. But above all, we are looking for a creative lead who knows how to combine the strengths of a full-service agency like Dept, from producers to designers and from innovation to digital marketing.
Please note that with your application we require you to submit a portfolio that speaks volumes about your talent, skills and experience. We look forward to seeing what you’ve got.

We are a young company and the best minds work every day for a wide range of customers, such as Bol.com, Eurojackpot, Converse, Chocomel, Netflix and many more. Yes, we are eager to bring on board the most talented experts in the game. But we are also looking for a perfect Dept-fit. Someone who is eager to learn and strives towards a better world, takes the stage, is a futurist at heart, and someone who is down to participate in curling activities once in a while. Ultimately, we are looking for a unique individual who can strengthen our collective. We strongly support diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
YOU:
Have +/- 7 years of experience at agencies such as Dept (required)
Have experience and/or an affinity with building, forging and leading a winning team
Have great ideas and concepts
Can switch from serious to play in an instant
Have an affinity with content thinking, social media, and technology
Master the Dutch and English language in word and writing
Have an affinity for advertising and digital campaigning
Can make beautiful Keynotes and you have good presentation skills
Have a good feeling for both copywriting and design.
WE OFFER:
An open company culture
Equipment for your working from home setup
Pension scheme
Possibilities to develop your skills even further via training and certifications
Access to our online health and wellbeing sessions (including yoga, meditation, Zumba, etc)
Healthy and tasty food
Free Bootcamp training twice a week
Friday drinks/open bar to wrap up the week
Great fringe benefits
column2: laptop, mobile phone, NS business card and many other goodies.

column1: WHO ARE WE?

Hi, we are Dept - an international agency with the most experienced thinkers & doers. One agency where creativity, technology and data come together. We help reinvent & accelerate your digital reality by creating experiences that people want and organizations need.

103,health,Indeed,p_af776dd515ef02f1,Digital Innovation Research Lead,Modis IT, Hilversum,"Modis are looking for a Lead Digital Innovation Researcher to join our team, our chosen candidate would work at our global retail client, located in Hilversum.As Lead Digital Innovation Researcher you will work with engineer and innovation leads to run market validation research and support the design of new digital concepts and solutions by designing experiments to validate these concepts.Themes that will be looked at are Sustainability, purpose and health, Traceability, Stores of the future, new commerce, microfulfillment. These concepts will be for global use cases and the research done very consumer-centric
column2: think Interviews, creating Panels and AB Testing.You will be joining a growing team in a very high paced Agile environment.Required skills: · 5+ years exp. Researching Digital Transformations or Digital Experiences.· Familiarity with consumer focused research methods (interviewing, empathy maps, diary studies, shadowing, penning, etc.).· Experience within large multinational companies a plus.· Experience within teams that rapidly grow is a plus.Key Qualities: · Ability to work with business partners and aid in the ideation process.· Exceptional collaboration, listening, written and verbal communication skills.· Consultative approach to your work.· Comfortable working in a very fast-paced, and results-oriented environment.· Positive team player who seeks the collective success of the team.Contractduur 7 maandenJob Types: Full-time, TemporarySalary: From €5,000.00 per monthWork Remotely:Temporarily due to COVID-19COVID-19 Precaution(s):Remote interview processPersonal protective equipment provided or requiredPlastic shield at work stationsSocial distancing guidelines in placeVirtual meetingsSanitizing, disinfecting, or cleaning procedures in place",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 104,health,Indeed,p_6921bb90e9be4d2b,Clinical Research Professionals - Netherlands!,IQVIA, Amsterdam,"IQVIA™ is the leading human data science company focused on helping healthcare clients find unparalleled insights and better solutions for patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness the power of healthcare data, domain expertise, transformative technology, and advanced analytics to drive healthcare forward.

Are you passionate about working on innovative programmes in oncology, rare disease, cardiovascular, and other therapeutic areas partnering with a world-renowned top 5 pharma? Great, because we're hiring!
We're looking for innovative clinical research professionals just like you to join our global clinical operations teams across Europe.
We are recruiting the following roles:
Clinical Trial Administrators including, Finance & Regulatory Associates and Contract & Study Start Up Specialists
Clinical Research Associates (CRA’s) of all levels from 1-year experience through to Lead roles
Clinical Study Managers

You’ll be working with our sponsor to support multiple studies and sites across their diverse portfolio of trials. Every trial is unique, and our teams tackle interesting and challenging situations daily. You’ll enjoy the fast-paced and dynamic environment working within the country organisation, assigned to sites on a regional or national basis.

IQVIA is a leading global provider of advanced analytics, technology solutions and contract research services to the life sciences industry dedicated to delivering unique and actionable insights. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA has more than 65,000+ employees worldwide.

At IQVIA, we are committed to advancing human health and delivering real value and outcomes for customers and patients. We view each day as another opportunity to find new solutions and enable the next breakthrough.

We can offer you:Competitive Salary PackagesExcellent Benefits PackagesProgression opportunitiesEmployee Referral SchemePerformance Related BonusesExpert training and guidanceStreamlined managerial supportIndividualised approach to development
Join Us

Making a positive impact on human health takes insight, curiosity, and intellectual courage. It takes brave minds, pushing the boundaries to transform healthcare. Regardless of your role, you will have the opportunity to play an important part in helping our clients drive healthcare forward and ultimately improve outcomes for patients.

Forge a career with greater purpose, make an impact, and never stop learning.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=6921bb90e9be4d2b&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=79a495c3cda03262&assa=9698,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=6921bb90e9be4d2b&fccid=6b7a1dfe07e7f037&vjs=3,25 dagen geleden,25 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

105,health,Indeed,p_502f1644239f4d41,Commercial Strategy Analyst,Holland  Barrett, Amsterdam,"Krijg jij energie van een dynamische werkomgeving waarin je veel schakelt met diverse stakeholders? Heb je een sterk commercieel inzicht en ben je een kei in het analyseren van data? Vind je het leuk om meerdere projecten naast elkaar te managen en om nieuwe kansen te spotten? Lees dan snel verder!
Wat ga je doen?

Als Commercial Strategy Analyst binnen Holland & Barrett heb je een afwisselende en uitdagende functie. Met jouw oog voor detail en uitstekende adviesvaardigheden ben je in staat om overtuigende ‘storylines’ te creëren richting jouw stakeholders (inclusief directieniveau).

In deze functie ben je namelijk één van de belangrijkste sparringpartners voor datagedreven werken in de Benelux. Je houdt je voornamelijk bezig met het geven van advies op basis van omzet- en margeanalyses en customer insights (teneinde de klanttevredenheid en merkloyaliteit te kunnen verhogen).
Verder houd je je onder andere bezig met:
het analyseren van kansen, ontwikkelingen en trends
het ondersteunen van category management, digital, marketing en merchandising teams voor besluitvorming en strategie, door middel van excellente datagedreven advies, inzichten en rapportages
het bijdragen aan het verder optimaliseren van operationele processen in ons distributiecentrum en onze winkels
het verbeteren van onze markt- en klantkennis

Jouw scope zal echter breed zijn, met veel ruimte en vrijheid in je functie! Holland & Barrett groeit snel, waardoor je echt waarde zal kunnen vinden en toevoegen op veel plekken binnen de organisatie.

In deze functie rapporteer je aan Jeroen, onze Finance & Data Business Partner (hij bekleedde de functie van Commercial Strategy Analyst hiervoor). Je zal ook nauw samenwerken met de (Benelux) directie en de collega’ in de UK (met name voor projecten).
Profiel
WO werk- en denkniveau (Bedrijfskunde, Economie, Analytics)
Je hebt circa 3-5 jaar relevante werkervaring opgedaan in een soortgelijke functie
Je hebt een achtergrond in (strategie) consulting (bijvoorbeeld in de advisory tak) of retail, inclusief ervaring met commerciële-en klantgedreven analyses
Je beheerst zowel de Nederlandse- als de Engelse taal goed in woord en geschrift
Je beschikt over sterke analytische- en probleemoplossende vaardigheden
Je bent behendig in het werken met (meerdere) grote datasets om hier hét inzicht uit te halen
Je kunt goed overweg met het MS-Office pakket
column2: met name Excel en PowerPoint kennen voor jou geen geheimen

column1: Je hebt ervaring (of je bent bereid om dit te leren) met ‘advanced analytics tools’ zoals Alteryx/Knime, SQL en Python/R met bijbehorende statistische technieken.
Je kunt je bovendien vinden in de volgende eigenschappen: communicatief sterk, creatief, zelfredzaam, ondernemend en een uitstekend oog voor detail.
Wat wij je bieden
Dit is jouw kans om de strategie en tactics van de grootste health-&-wellnessretailer van de Benelux vorm te geven!

Holland & Barrett biedt een interessante functie in een succesvolle en informele omgeving aan, waarbij er ruimte is om jezelf te ontwikkelen en nieuwe ideeën te realiseren. Binnen onze organisatie zijn doorgroeimogelijkheden een prioriteit. Verder bieden we een goed salaris welke afhankelijk is van jouw ervaring. Tevens hebben wij goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals personeelskorting, pensioenregeling, 28 vakantiedagen, een eigen training Academy, gratis fruit, een eigen gym op kantoor (maar momenteel werken we natuurlijk vanuit huis) en diverse collectiviteitskortingen op zorgverzekeringen.
Sollicitatieprocedure
Heb je interesse in deze functie? Solliciteer dan direct met jouw CV en motivatiebrief via de solliciteerbutton op onze website.

Indien je positief bent geselecteerd dan word je uitgenodigd voor een telefonische screening met onze recruiter. Mocht je na deze screening positief worden bevonden, dan plannen we zo snel mogelijk een eerste sollicitatiegesprek met jou in. Je kunt maximaal twee gespreksrondes verwachten. Een case kan onderdeel uitmaken van de procedure.
Over ons

Holland & Barrett is een van de meest geliefde en vertrouwde merken in biologische voeding, vitaminen, supplementen en clean beauty, allemaal verkocht door goed opgeleide en gekwalificeerde adviseurs. Holland & Barrett heeft meer dan 1.300 winkels wereldwijd, waarvan meer dan 230 in Nederland en België. Met meer dan 1300 werknemers in de winkels en het hoofdkantoor in Amsterdam, is de Benelux de grootste van Holland & Barretts internationale markten én een van de meest concurrerende.

Holland & Barrett is sterk gegroeid over de afgelopen jaren, en onze groei is de laatste tijd – om overduidelijke redenen – alleen maar versneld. Ondertussen hebben we onze operatie en cultuur versterkt om nóg klantgerichter te worden, en de wereldwijde leider in health en wellness. We nodigen jou uit om hieraan deel te nemen en om verdere groei als echte omnichannel retailer mogelijk te maken.

* Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld. Aan CV's die ongevraagd worden aangeleverd kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend.*",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=502f1644239f4d41&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=cdafe7fde9e6d1db&assa=924,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=502f1644239f4d41&fccid=344344dda6e83d9f&vjs=3,25 dagen geleden,25 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

106,health,Indeed,p_3e3e23419003b2bd,Office Manager,Secfi, Amsterdam,"Secfi’s mission is to help startup employees & shareholders understand, maximize and unlock the value of their equity. We provide education, tax planning tools and financing to guide employees on their journey from startup to exit.

Our set of online forecasting tools enable individuals to assess the value of their stock options and calculate the cost to exercise. Financing is available to help employees exercise options or unlock liquidity for important financial goals. And our team of Equity Advisors is available to assist every step of the way. We bring clarity, peace of mind and thoughtful planning to thousands of startup employees.

Working for a scale-up feels like building a plane while already flying in the air. It’s messy, it’s exciting, and you are constantly learning. Customer Focus, Perseverance, Action, Ownership, Diversity, and Team are embedded in everything we do.

For our People Team, we are looking for a dynamic, creative Office Manager with a positive attitude. Your main job is to make sure everyone can do their best work comfortably and happily at home and in the office. You organize events to bring the team together and you assist in administrative tasks for the People and Finance team. This role offers a unique opportunity to have an impact on our (office) culture and employee happiness.
Additional Responsibilities
Making sure everyone’s workspaces (at the office and at home) are set up
Take care of all administrative matters: office supplies, perks and benefits, health and safety, and other everyday needs
Maintaining relations with all office related vendors
Assist the Finance and People teams in admin related matters, varying from contracts to payroll, etc.
Be the carrier of a good office vibe
column2: manage team-building events, celebrations, and communication

column1: Assist in on-boarding / off-boarding
Assist in candidate searches / participate in external recruiting events
What we’re looking for
University Degree in Psychology, HRM, Marketing or Business Management
1+ years demonstrable experience within Office, HR, or People related jobs, preferably for a fast growing startup
Ability to work without direct supervision, and efficiently manage tasks and time
Passion for technology, intellectual curiosity and willingness to learn
Strong communication and team collaboration skills
Strong relationship building skills, high in empathy
A positive can-do attitude
What you can expect
Competitive salary
Attractive and flexible vacation & parental leave policy
Company sponsored lunches, snacks, drinks and team events
Great work environment designed to help your professional growth
And last but not least, a great and fun experience
The opportunity to grow into a People/Recruitment/HR position

This is a part-time role and only for candidates residing in the Netherlands.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=3e3e23419003b2bd&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=f3c987e6ca34d164&assa=1684,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=3e3e23419003b2bd&fccid=2a75d95af05376de&vjs=3,25 dagen geleden,25 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
107,health,Indeed,p_a4bd8544d3b3bfa8,Web Content Publisher / Coordinator - Global E-commerce,Harman International, Amsterdam,"Additional Work Location(s) :None

Have you heard of JBL or Harman/Kardon, some of the world’s leading audio brands? The market we are leading in, is fast paced, fun and dynamic. Our Lifestyle division has seen continuous growth over the last 5 years and doesn't plan to stop there. For our Global E-commerce department within Harman Consumer Lifestyle, based in Amsterdam, we are looking to hire a:
Web Content Publisher/Coordinator - Global E-commerce
About the Role:

We are looking for a team player to support our E-commerce growth by ensuring that product content is available timely and of the highest quality standard. You are a meticulous, organized and process driven Web Content Publisher/Coordinator who is hands-on and motivated. Having all the boxes ticked is what makes you happy in your work. In this role, you support the growth of E-commerce within Harman as follows:
What You Will Do:

NPIs (New Product Introductions): you will be responsible for website launch readiness by loading and/or importing content, translations and assets into the PIM (Product Information Management) system or DAM (Digital Asset Management) tools respectively for your assigned product categories.
Follow up with internal suppliers (traffic team, central marketing) for any missing or incomplete assets.
Liaise with product & marketing stakeholders for sign-off / approval at key gates of the NPI.
Perform basic Quality Control on product content & completeness.
One-off content projects as required by the manager.
Merchandiser Support that cover all tasks related to merchandising products on the website.
Provide support to regional merchandisers on questions related to getting products on the website.
Manage and provide user accounts for SFCC Business Manager.
What You Need:
Web Content Management background.
Experienced in using Jira or another tracking system and PIM or CMS.
Fluent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Experience in dealing with set priorities and keeping tight deadlines.
Experience within a diverse, multi-cultural team.
Hands-on / getting things done mentality.
What is Nice to Have:
Feeds & integration: Own, maintain & troubleshoot the data feeds out of our PIM to stakeholders & systems (Product feed, Google, Mamenta, a.o.).
Specifically manage the integration between Salsify PIM and SFCC systems and the associated XML publishing and processing.
Own the creation of new properties in Salsify
column2: product owner for Salsify.

column1: What We Offer:

HARMAN offers a great work environment, challenging career opportunities, professional training and competitive market base compensation plus a 13th month salary, 28 holidays per year. You will also receive a highly valued commuter travel package, an interesting collective health insurance scheme, pension and top-notch employee discounts on Harman’s Consumer Audio products.
A unique opportunity to contribute to drive revenue growth and nurture strategic trust-based relationships.
A friendly working atmosphere and good work-life-balance with a fine salary and secondary employment conditions.
The ability to work as a Web Content Publisher/Coordinator in a company that is driven by technology.
The chance to work with on complex problems and continues improvement.
An informal, enterprising and results-orientated culture.
And a few reasons you might love it:
At HARMAN we create useful, playful, beautiful things. Our many iconic brands including
column2: JBL, Harman/Kardon and AKG are transforming the car, the workplace and everywhere in between. We work hard, look for brilliance from all our 30,000 employees and in return you can expect a career full of brilliant possibilities. If you want to be part of a business offering industry-first features, innovation, superior sound technology and the guarantee that you'll never have a dull day - HARMAN could be the place for you!

108,health,Indeed,p_78a7b47a3adf4e9a,Digital Marketing Specialist US,Virtuagym, Amsterdam Oost,"Are you ready for a new and exciting challenge at an international SaaS scale-up?

We are looking for a creative and energetic Digital Marketing Specialist - US, a T-shaped marketer who will be responsible for owning and improving the marketing mix for our US Market. Think of adapting our message and campaign strategy to the different states, leading our (digital) events, creating value out of our customer stories and so on.
This will be a high-impact role within the Marketing Team and you will become a key driver of Virtuagym’s growth.
Will you join us in our quest to create a healthier and happier world?
What this role looks like:
Gaining a deep understanding of our US-based customers and prospects, including their organizational goals, structures, motivations, and buying processes
Developing compelling and attention-grabbing messaging for high-impact interactions in order to create awareness among our target audience
Owning the US digital event mix, leading our podcasts and webinars together with our Events team
Finding new and innovative ways to target and engage our US prospects across all marketing channels, identifying the best platforms to reach them through thoughtfully crafted outbound campaigns
Establishing and reporting on metrics that help refine the performance of these initiatives, while keeping an eye on the full funnel (closed deals and retention).
What you bring to the table:
You are a T-shaped marketer with 4+ years of experience, you have a broad knowledge covering a wide range of digital tactics, across multiple channels and platforms
You have good public speaking skills and feel comfortable in front of a camera or behind a microphone
You are a self-starter, highly skilled in handling multiple projects at once and a master at prioritization and getting things done
You know how to improvise, think creatively, and be an enthusiastic problem solver, coming up with creative and unorthodox ideas to engage prospects
You know how to deal with a fast-paced scale-up environment and adapt quickly to changing priorities - B2B experience is a plus
You are analytical and data-driven with an openness to change course as needed based on consistent measurement and tracking
You are a US English speaker with strong communication skills and direct experience of the US market - bonus points if you’ve worked in the fitness sector!
Here’s why you should come work with us:
You’ll be joining a diverse and international team made up of over 30 nationalities across our offices in Amsterdam and Medellin, working in an easy-going and fun environment
As a scale-up, we offer great freedom and autonomy to take ownership of projects and to develop your skills and experience with us
We are remote-friendly, so you'll have the option to work both from home and in the office (when possible)
We provide 25 paid holidays per year, holiday allowance and a pension plan
Stay healthy with our Health Program: we provide monthly contribution towards your gym subscription, offer free weekly crossfit and a Friends & Family gym discount
We love to learn: join our knowledge exchange sessions (pizza included!) and Lunch & Learns with interesting speaker.
About us:

Virtuagym is a leading tech company providing innovative fitness software for gyms, personal trainers, and corporate health services. Virtuagym has grown into an all-in-one solution for client coaching, membership management, billing, scheduling, access control and more. It’s integrated mobile fitness apps offer solutions for exercise, nutrition guidance, progress tracking, and online coaching.

With 200+ employees across two offices in Europe and Latin America, Virtuagym supports more than 15 million end-users, 30,000+ trainers worldwide and over 5,000 health clubs, including Basic-Fit (NL), Xercise4Less (UK), various YMCA’s (USA), and XSport (USA).

With over 100% growth every year, we keep reinventing ourselves in the fast-paced fitness technology domain. While we are beyond the startup phase, we still cherish our start-up culture and non-corporate approach. At Virtuagym you get the opportunity to grow and we empower you to explore, learn and do great things as we conquer the world with our great solutions!
Ready To Join Us?

Please do not hesitate to apply by clicking the ‘Apply for this Job’ button below! We will get back to your application within 5 working days. For any questions on the vacancy, please get in touch with the recruitment team at recruitment@virtuagym.com.
Please note that we do not collaborate with third parties to fill this vacancy.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 109,health,Indeed,p_61ac13bfbbfb8f50,"Benefits Program Manager, EMEA",Atlassian, Amsterdam,"Atlassian is continuing to hire with all interviewing and on-boarding done virtually due to COVID-19. All new and existing Atlassians will continue to work from home until it’s safe to return to our offices. When our offices re-open, we will provide the choice to work from home or return to work in an office unless a job requirement makes it necessary for a particular role to be performed at an Atlassian office.

This is a fantastic opportunity to join Atlassian's Total Rewards team and be a part of building our global benefits programs that support our open culture and values. We’re excited to grow our team with an experienced Benefits Program Manager for our EMEA region!

Job Description
Division: Global Business Excellence - Global Revenue Management
Location: Amsterdam, Netherlands
Temporary Position – One year project
About the Position

The Global Revenue Management team is looking for an experienced and dynamic Global Revenue Manager – TPO – Project Manager to make a difference at Kraft Heinz. You’ll be working in a young high performing team, alongside colleagues always driving Net Revenue Growth. You’ll be reporting to the Global Revenue Management Promotions Lead. You will be accountable for leading the global roll-out agenda of all Trade Promotional Optimization (TPO) activities in the company, across different countries. You will be challenged to find optimal promotional solutions for a wide range of retailer and categories landscapes! Get ready for a lot of exposure to internal senior stakeholders.
Who we are looking for:

We are seeking a candidate who has a developed understanding of pricing and FMCG trade management concepts with proven ability to carefully and logically assess risks, benefits and alternatives. This individual should be comfortable communicating with and influencing key stakeholders across a highly-matrixed organization. The ideal candidate will also have a successful track record of executing transformation projects. True ownership, analytical skills and business acumen are key characteristics to excel at this position.
Responsibilities:

Be an agent of change into Kraft Heinz Company organization, using data, statistics, process and social skills to move different stakeholders towards the goal of increasing trade promotional efficiency (more with less)
Chief a positive environment into your team, genuinely interested in the well-being and happiness of your colleagues

Support Global RevMan promotion Lead into managing large scale TPO projects - overseeing vendors and KHC teams from different commercial areas in each country, you will leverage business data and statistical methods to provide insight into key performance indicators for trade promotional optimization within Kraft Heinz globally
As a subject matter expert, design and recommend appropriate analytical approaches to address key issues within the business, balancing priorities and resources.
Liaison with the stakeholders to understand their business peculiarities and develop and implement solutions that will support him in driving promotional effectiveness.

Support Commercial Leaders across different countries to guide and elevate the analytical abilities across KHC. Empower and support the teams in creating analytics tools for data-driven decision making.
Communicate promotional strategies and concepts to various levels of the organization and document issues related to the projects using Change Management templates and techniques.

Partner with the Global RevMan Pricing Lead and Global RevMan Capabilities Lead to set the analytics vision and strategy for each function through partnership with senior leadership, championing the use of data in making strategic business decisions.
Requirement & Skills
Bachelor or Master degree (MBA included). Preference for business, computer science, statistics, data science
Minimal 5 year working experience in CPG environment, preferably in Revenue Management, Finance, Marketing/Category or Sales
Understanding of statistics and its appliance to solve forecast and optimization problems
Understanding of Trade P&L structure, with knowledge of each lever that can generate positive results in margin and volume
Strong recent & related experience with MS Office (i.e., Excel & Powerpoint) and BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.). Knowledge of SQL coding is a plus.
Strong project management skills required, with ability to prioritize and follow through
Highly organized with a keen sense of focus and ability to meet required goals under time critical deadlines in a stressful environment.
Strong social skills, with ability to understand the context and utilize it to drive an agenda
Demonstrated financial knowledge, with the ability to evaluate financial data and interpret as relevant data points in review and approval consideration.
Strong ownership, never giving up and really committed to drive an agenda even in adverse environments
Language fluency: English

An ambitious employer

Job Description
Role / Title:
We have an excellent opportunity available for an experienced procurement professional to make a difference at Kraft Heinz. The position lies within the Global Procurement

You will be responsible for the development and implementation of global sourcing and supplier management strategies that create partnerships between KHC and supplier(s) of choice and deliver tangible results in time-bound period. You will build and lead the EM Best Practices and Category Strategy in collaboration with the Zone Leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to build a dynamic External Manufacturing network.

This involves an integrated, proactive approach with participation from appropriate members of various Regions / Business Units and collaboration with the zones. You’ll be working in a high performing team, alongside peers always trying to reach the next level. Get ready for a lot of exposure to internal senior stakeholders!
Key Components of the role:

Global lead in building a dynamic network of External Manufacturers for existing Kraft Heinz finished goods and innovation pipeline, in line with the business and operations strategy and ensuring consistency and compliance with global procurement policy and standards.

Development and implementation of market-oriented global category sourcing and supplier management strategies to achieve competitive advantage through lowest purchase cost and value improvements consistent with the direction set by the business

Build capability to meet long term vision of using flexible agile external manufacturing network
Furthermore, you need to be results oriented, analytical and have a strategic mindset, detail oriented but also being able to see the big picture
You have good networking and influencing capabilities to manage a big number of different stakeholders. Dares, challenges and drives the transformation

Purchasing skills and especially strong analytical skills
Project Management, prioritization, coordination skills
Good knowledge of P&L / cogs structure
English language is essential, ideally second and third language in advantage
Knowledge: Advanced user of MS Office, MS Excel in particular

Strong team player

Solid analytical skills and strong ability in problem solving
Organized and structured

118,health,Indeed,p_85fdd858f92b0a72,Marketing Data Specialist,Emesa, Amsterdam,"Wie ben jij?

Je bent een enthousiaste en resultaatgerichte Marketing Data Specialist met 2-4 jaar ervaring. Je werkt graag met de nieuwste technologie en je bent bedreven in het oplossen van complexe problemen in teamverband. Je weet hoe je waarde kan creëren voor onze user base en streeft altijd naar een hogere conversie, meer groei en betere marge.
Herken jij jezelf hierin en ben je nieuwsgierig naar deze functie? Lees dan snel verder!
De uitdaging

Als onderdeel van ons multidisciplinaire CRM-team ben je verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling en uitvoering van data-gestuurde marketingcampagnes. We hebben een uitgebreide marketing technologie stack waarin een recent geïmplementeerd Customer Data Platform centraal staat. Hiermee ben je in staat onze klanten gepersonaliseerd 1:1 te targeten via verschillende kanalen, waaronder e-mail, app-push, web/app en Paid media. Je werkt samen in het CRM team in een dynamische en jonge omgeving. Je werkt snel en nauwkeurig, neemt de verantwoordelijkheid voor je eigen werk en speelt een belangrijke rol op de marketingafdeling
Wat ga je doen?
Je vertaalt onze marketingstrategie naar Omni-channel marketingcampagnes.
Je ontwikkelt data-gedreven Journeys voor Touchpoints waaronder e-mail, app-push, Paid media en web/app.
Je experimenteert met slimme doelgroep- en content-strategieën in onze bulkcommunicatie.
Je werkt nauw samen met andere disciplines, waaronder Data Scientists, online marketeers en CRO-specialisten om implementaties op te leveren over onze gehele data-, marketing- & ad-stacks.
Je werkt met toonaangevende tools in ons dynamische marketingtechnologielandschap.
Je gaat werken met de grote datasets die horen bij een groot state-of-the-art E-commerceplatform als de onze.
Wat verwachten we van jou?
Minimaal WO werk- en denkniveau
Je bent een expert in de volgende technologieën (of wil er graag een worden):
Ervaring met Selligent of andere CRM-tools
Je beheerst SQL en hebt ervaring met relationele databases
Enige ervaring met HTML/CSS (gewenst maar niet vereist)
Je hebt uitstekende communicatie- en teamworkvaardigheden
Je bent organisatorisch sterk en hebt oog voor detail
Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal
Je voelt je thuis in een snel veranderende omgeving.
+ Ervaring met Tealium (of andere DMP’s/CDP’s) is een pre.
+ Ervaring met Airship, of je hebt gewerkt met vergelijkbare app marketing platforms (gewenst maar niet vereist).
+ Ervaring met de volgende technologieën is een pluspunt: data-analyseplatforms, multivariate testtools en/of on-site personalisatieplatforms.
Een dag Marketing Data Specialist?

“Het is maandagochtend 9 uur, je opent snel je laptop met een kopje koffie want je bent benieuwd hoe je nieuwste optimalisatie het gedaan heeft. Je analyseert de resultaten en verwerkt deze in een slide-deck om aan het team te presenteren.

Om 10 uur spar je met een Data Scientist over de implementatie van hun nieuwe model in onze kanalen. Je start met het bouwen van dit proces, terwijl een CRO-specialist bij je aanklopt met een vraag over de logica achter de personalisatie op onze website en in de app.
S ’middags werk je aan een business case voor een nieuwe tool, die je morgen presenteert aan de architect. Daarna check je hoe een van onze automatische processen slimmer gebruik kan maken van data.

Om 16:30 uur bel je via Teams in voor de wekelijkse (virtuele) Bootcamp les, zo begin je fit aan je werkweek. Voordat je je laptop dicht klapt, zet je nog even een nieuwe AB-test live. Morgenochtend snel de eerste resultaten bekijken! ""
Wat mag je van ons verwachten?

Natuurlijk word je maandelijks beloond met een goed salaris incl. een aantrekkelijke bonusregeling. Je bouwt aan je toekomst door deelname aan onze pensioenregeling. Ook bieden we je een uitgebreide aanvullende verzekering op het gebied van arbeidsongeschiktheidsrisico's
Mogelijkheden om je Marketing Automation vaardigheden verder te ontwikkelen binnen een snel groeiende, informele en resultaatgerichte e-commerce organisatie
Een veelzijdige, afwisselende plek met jonge en enthousiaste collega's in een leuke veranderingsgerichte organisatie
Veel zelfstandigheid en verantwoordelijkheid en ruimte voor eigen inbreng

We hebben oog voor jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Daar ben je bij Emesa primair zelf verantwoordelijk voor, maar met onze Emesa Academy, individuele trainingen en vele doorgroeimogelijkheden dragen we daar graag aan bij

Met de uitgebreide lunch en koffiebar beneden kom jij vol energie de werkdag door. Mocht het weer mogelijk zijn: Op vrijdagmiddag sluiten we de week af met een VrijMiBo :-) en zorgt de Emesa Health Club dat je fit blijft.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=85fdd858f92b0a72&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=29994ea095a62e5d&assa=7393,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=85fdd858f92b0a72&fccid=67d4b8bca8c0b716&vjs=3,16 dagen geleden,16 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral

ABOUT SC JOHNSON

SC Johnson is a fifth-generation family company built on a spirit of adventure and winning the right way. We have been leading with purpose for over 130 years, building top brands such as Raid®, Glade®, Kiwi®, OFF!®, Windex®, Ziploc® and more, in virtually every country. Through these household names, we are making a positive difference to the world around us. But we only succeed with the combined vitality and strength of our 13,000 people who we truly value and support in their pursuit of individual and shared goals.
ROLE SUMMARY
Do you enjoy a good challenge and working in a fast-paced environment where you get to work with a regional team in one of the company’s largest manufacturing site globally?
Then you should consider joining SC Johnson in Netherlands as Technical Administrative Specialist!

Reporting to the R&D Director Europe, you will be responsible for supporting the PCM team (engineering) with technical administrative tasks (PLM), lab testing and sample preparation (shipment). You will also be office area owner and provide support with SHE topics as well with PO creations and travels organization for the team.

Based in Mijdrecht, Netherlands you’ll be working in one of the most important plants for SCJ in Europe. We can offer you a competitive salary plus profit share and benefits that care about the well-being of our people: travel allowance, collective discount on Dutch health insurance, additional Cafeteria model (you can choose between a lump sum payment per year or extra days for your holidays), etc. The facilities in Mijdrecht include free parking, canteen, tennis court, game room and lots of local events are organized to share the team spirit among our people.

Spec clean up finalization
Special packs tasks

Leadership:
1. Demonstrate behaviours that reflect SCJ Success Drivers and establish a “Mindset to Win” Culture across team.
2. Curiosity, entrepreneurial attitude & assertiveness
3. Taking initiative, bringing forward ideas of improvement for own work, office environment, communication, etc..
POSITION REQUIREMENTS
Diploma or Degree in Science or related studies that demonstrate fit with the role
At least one year of experience or internship in a similar role
English fluent. Dutch and other languages skills are considered a competitive advantage
Proven ability to work with Excel
Excellent organizational skills with hands on attitude
Positive mindset with a team spirit attitude
Expertise in production and processing environments is considered competitive advantage

120,health,Indeed,p_aa2e13c62629164d,Medewerker Ambtelijk Secretariaat Toelatings- en Examencommissies (Tijdelijk),Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, AmsterdamZuidoost,"Ben jij een flexibele en vooral stressbestendige teamspeler, die het een uitdaging vindt om in deze bijzondere tijd het ambtelijk secretariaat van onze Toelatings- en Examencommissies te ondersteunen? Solliciteer dan bij de Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU).
Locatie: AMSTERDAM
Functieomschrijving

Als medewerker studentzaken bij het ambtelijk secretariaat van de Toelatings- en Examencommissies ondersteun je de ambtelijk secretarissen bij het verwerken van toelatingsverzoeken van aspirant studenten voor onze (pre)master opleidingen en bij de verwerking van processen-verbaal van de (online) tentamens van onze opleidingen. Je zorgt dat toelatingsverzoeken worden voorgelegd aan de verschillende toelatingscommissies die je ondersteunt en draagt zorg voor een tijdige administratieve afhandeling van de verzoeken en terugkoppeling aan de studenten. Daarnaast assisteer je bij het afhandelen van mogelijke fraudemeldingen bij tentamens. Je doet dit samen met je collega's in het kleine team dat zowel de Toelatingscommissies als Examencommissies van de faculteit ondersteunt.
Jouw taken
verzamelen, voorleggen en afhandelen van toelatingsverzoeken tot de verschillende (pre)masteropleidingen binnen de faculteit
coördineren van de onderzoeken die voortkomen uit de processen-verbaal van tentamens
beantwoorden van vragen van (aankomende) studenten in Topdesk
versturen en verwerken van uitslagen van het premasterassessment
archivering
Functie-eisen
afgeronde HBO of WO opleiding
bij voorkeur enige ervaring binnen het (hoger) onderwijs en/of in een soortgelijke functie
nauwkeurig maar vlot kunnen werken
stressbestendig en een proactieve werkhouding
uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk
Wat bieden wij

Een uitdagende functie bij een maatschappelijk betrokken organisatie. Het salaris bedraagt afhankelijk van opleiding en ervaring op voltijdse basis minimaal €2.329 (schaal 7) en maximaal €3.144 (schaal 7) bruto per maand. De functie is ingedeeld volgens UFO-profiel: Medewerker Studentzaken 3 en staat open voor 0,6 fte - 0,8 fte.

De arbeidsovereenkomst wordt in eerste instantie aangegaan voor een periode van 6 maanden. Het betreft twee tijdelijke functies van ongeveer gelijke omvang i.v.m. zwangerschapsvervanging en ondersteuning bij de zomerpiek.
Daarnaast beschikt de VU over aantrekkelijke secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden en regelingen die een goede combinatie van werk en privé mogelijk maken, zoals:
maximaal 41 vakantiedagen bij een voltijds dienstverband
8% vakantietoeslag en 8,3% eindejaarsuitkering
bijdrage aan reiskosten voor woon-werkverkeer
Over de VU

Bijdragen aan een betere wereld door onderscheidend onderwijs en grensverleggend onderzoek, dat is de ambitie van de VU. Een universiteit waar persoonlijke vorming én maatschappelijke betrokkenheid centraal staan. Waar we vanuit verschillende disciplines en achtergronden samenwerken aan innovaties en nieuwe inzichten. Ons onderzoek beslaat het hele spectrum: van alfa, gamma en bèta tot leven en medische wetenschappen.

Aan de VU studeren ruim 26.500 studenten en werken en meer dan 4.600 medewerkers. De uitstekend bereikbare VU-campus is gevestigd in het hart van de Amsterdamse Zuidas, een inspirerende omgeving voor onderwijs en onderzoek.
Diversiteit

Diversiteit is een kernwaarde van de VU. Wij staan voor een inclusieve gemeenschap en geloven dat diversiteit en internationalisering bijdragen aan de kwaliteit van onderwijs en onderzoek. We zijn dan ook voortdurend op zoek naar mensen die door hun achtergrond en ervaring bijdragen aan de diversiteit van onze campus.
Faculteit der Gedrags- en Bewegingswetenschappen

De Faculteit der Gedrags- en Bewegingswetenschappen (FGB) richt zich op het brede domein van gedrag en gezondheid. Met ons onderwijs en onderzoek spelen we actief in op de actuele ontwikkelingen in de maatschappij. Van gezond ouder worden tot e-health, van jeugdcriminaliteit tot de aanpak van depressiviteit, van training voor topsporters tot social media als onderwijstool. Uniek is dat we drie disciplines combineren: psychologie, bewegingswetenschappen en pedagogiek.

Werken bij Gedrags- en Bewegingswetenschappen is werken bij een ambitieuze organisatie die zich kenmerkt door een informele sfeer en korte communicatielijnen. Bij FGB krijg je alle ruimte voor je persoonlijke ontwikkeling. De faculteit telt ongeveer 3.500 studenten en ca 600 medewerkers.
Over de afdeling

Het Onderwijsbureau verzorgt de ondersteuning van het onderwijs ten behoeve van studenten en docenten. Het ambtelijk secretariaat van de Examen- en Toelatingscommissies maakt deel uit van het Onderwijsbureau. Binnen het onderwijsbureau zijn verder o.a. de onderwijscoördinator, studieadviseurs, beleidsmedewerkers en medewerkers studentzaken werkzaam.
Solliciteren

Ben jij geïnteresseerd in deze functie? Solliciteer dan door middel van onderstaande solliciteer button uiterlijk 11 februari 2021 . Denk hierbij aan het uploaden van jouw curriculum vitae en motivatiebrief. De sollicitatiegesprekken vinden online plaats op 19 en 22 februari. Indien mogelijk vragen wij je hier rekening mee te houden.
Sollicitaties ontvangen per e-mail worden niet in behandeling genomen.
Vragen
Voor vragen over de vacature kun je contact opnemen met:
Naam: Annemarie Baaijens
Functie: Hoofd Onderwijsbureau
E-mail: a.m.t.baaijens@vu.nl

121,health,Indeed,pj_19ca2d4d2f341139,Senior Clinical Research Associate,PRA Health Sciences, Nederland,"Providing innovative solutions for our clients is what we do. But innovation just for the sake of innovation isn’t why we do it. Side-by-side with our clients, we strive to move drug discovery forward, to help them develop lifesaving and life-improving drugs. We help change people’s lives for the better every single day. It’s who we are. And it’s who you could be too. Working fully embedded within one of our pharmaceutical clients, with the support of PRA right behind you, you’ll be at the heart of our client’s innovation.
Responsibilities
As a Clinical Research Associate (CRA), you will be dedicated to one of our global clients, a global biotechnology company that develops transformative therapies targeting cancer.

The CRA is responsible for monitoring and management of clinical sites. This position focuses on all activities required to evaluate, initiate, monitor and close clinical sites in compliance with the Regulations and ICH/GCP Guidelines

Responsibilities:Act as liaison between the in-house team, vendors, and multiple clinical sites.Work collaboratively with investigative sites to develop strong, long-term, working relationships.Apply SOPs, Clinical Monitoring Plan (CMP), study manuals and other materials and guidelines as applicable.Help identify and qualify potential investigators.Perform all type of visits from Pre-Study to Close out.Provide initial and ongoing training to site personnel regarding the study protocol, applicable policies/procedures, and GCP.Assist with start-up activities, including essential document review and collection as requested.Lead and drive regulatory Ethics Committee submission and site start-up activities in partnership with investigator sites including the support of EC follow up queries and responses as required.Liaise with sites to support contracts/budget negotiation and support the development and adaptation of country/site specific informed consent forms under the direction of the internal team.

We believe our Clinical Operations team is second to none. You will receive the support you need to develop personally and professionally and work in an environment where you matter. Our team pushes forward together. United in solving problems, developing close site relationships and reaching the end goal. Operating as a key part of a global study team, the CRA plays a fundamental role in our clients’ drug development processes.
Qualifications
Detail-orientated, passionate and reliable.
Here at PRA we want our employees to succeed and ensure that they are set up for this success through constant training, development and support. To enable success in this position you will have:

Prior and solid experience as a CRA working in investigator site management, including conducting monitoring visits, from either a pharmaceutical company or a CRO environment.A working knowledge of ICH-GCP guidelines and local and international regulatory requirements is essential.You will be educated to degree level, have equivalent experience or be a licensed healthcare professional.Experience in central submissions and hospital submissions as well as experience in contract negotiation.Experience working in oncology clinical trials.
Your health, your family, your career, your money — the things that matter to you, matter to us. The benefits of PRA just get better and better.
PRA Health Sciences is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace.
For more information please visit our website: www.prahs.com

122,health,Indeed,p_66fa1eeefe3a8f7e,Digital Customer Experience Specialist,MSD, Haarlem,"Are you an expert on digital customer engagement and do you have knowledge of digital channels, and able to develop and evolve a strategy and knows how to successfully leverage content online? Did you always want to work in a company where your work can have a real impact on people’s life? Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire? We would like to meet you!
We have an exciting new job opportunity at our location in Haarlem and are looking to hire a Digital Customer Experience Specialist (DCES)
Purpose of the role

With internal and external pressure on pharmaceutical business models, it is essential to transform how we engage, market and communicate to better meet customer needs and improve business results. Furthermore, the integration and coordination of personal and non-personal capabilities represents a unique opportunity to differentiate our company from the competition to deliver a cohesive customer experience and ensure all our customer engagement capabilities remain relevant and competitive.

With strong digital skills you will be the partner of the brand teams in creating and implementing the digital strategy. You will be responsible for the planning, execution and analytics of the digital campaigns to constantly improve the engagement with our customers. By testing and analyzing digital campaigns you can provide the brand teams with descriptive analytics as input for their strategy. You are constantly looking for new ideas on reaching and engaging our customers to enhance the experience and to drive business for the different franchises.
Main responsibilities
Enhance customer engagement
Create the digital strategy and a digital tactical calendar
You are an expert on digital and knows how to educate/coach BCM’s on digital
Negotiation with vendors regarding performance based digital marketing (new contracts)
Campaign execution (internal and in collaboration with agencies)
Analyze and advise brand teams based on campaign analytics
Research and implement new digital channels
Collaborate with other countries to share digital best practices and bring them to NL
Collaborate with vendors/IT Hub to automate data capture methodologies
Drive commercial success and franchise growth by launching successful digital campaigns
Support sales teams with digital assets
Proven ability to understand & learn science and translate it into simple messages
Strong communication and negotiation skills.
Human Health Division

Our Human Health Division maintains a “patient first, profits later” ideology. The organization is comprised of sales, marketing, market access, digital analytics and commercial professionals who are passionate about their role in bringing our medicines to our customers worldwide.
Your Profile
Bachelor/Master’s degree
Experience in online marketing and e-mail marketing
Motivational / inspirational skills
Knowledge of digital channels
Affinity with health care
Team player
Ability to transfer knowledge to internal stakeholders
UX design knowledge / experience
Experience working in Scrum teams is preferred
Fluent in conversational and written Dutch and English.
What we offer

We welcome you to a truly global, dynamic and challenging environment with great opportunities for personal development. Our benefits are very competitive, and the summary below will give you an idea of what you can expect.
Competitive salary and a 3% year-end bonus
35,5 days of leave
Attractive collective health care insurance package with considerable reduction rates
Solid Pension Plan
Incentive Plan
Travel allowance for commuting
Numerous training, coaching and e-learning modules for long term job opportunities and development.
Who we are …

We are known as Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.

We are driven by our purpose to develop and deliver innovative products that save and improve lives. With 69,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, we offer state of the art laboratories, plants and offices that are designed to Inspire our employees as we learn, develop and grow in our careers. We are proud of our 125 years of service to humanity and continue to be one of the world’s biggest investors in Research & Development.
What we look for …

In a world of rapid innovation, we seek brave Inventors who want to make an Impact in all aspects of our business, enabling breakthroughs that will affect generations to come. We encourage you to bring your disruptive thinking, collaborative spirit and diverse perspective to our organization. Together we will continue Inventing For Life, Impacting Lives while Inspiring Your Career Growth.
INVENT.
IMPACT.
INSPIRE.

We are proud to be a company that embraces the value of bringing diverse, talented, and committed people together. The fastest way to breakthrough innovation is when diverse ideas come together in an inclusive environment. We encourage our colleagues to respectfully challenge one another’s thinking and approach problems collectively. We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace.
Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully

Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, NJ, USA, also known as Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp., Kenilworth, NJ, USA, does not accept unsolicited assistance from search firms for employment opportunities. All CVs / resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at our company without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of our company. No fee will be paid in the event a candidate is hired by our company as a result of an agency referral where no pre-existing agreement is in place. Where agency agreements are in place, introductions are position specific. Please, no phone calls or emails.
Employee Status:
Regular
Relocation:
Domestic
VISA Sponsorship:
Travel Requirements:
No Travel Required
Flexible Work Arrangements:
Not Specified
Shift:
Not Indicated
Valid Driving License:
No
Hazardous Material(s):

123,health,Indeed,p_075c8f2440594885,"Product Manager, Connected Health",Irdeto, Hoofddorp,"This is a one of a kind opportunity for a driven Product Manager to bring cybersecurity into the world of Healthcare & Life Sciences. We have now entered a new era where the security paradigm is very different from what it used to be. Medical Device manufacturers need a comprehensive security strategy including the monitoring and protection of all connected devices (medical, IT and mobile) from within the device itself. In this role you will define and execute Irdeto’s product vision, strategy and roadmap with the market demand to ensure product fit and profitability. Because this is a new market for Irdeto, you will work in a unique, start-up environment while being surrounded by Irdeto’s strong expertise in cybersecurity.

Our global business development team focuses on creating long term growth opportunities and business relationships for Irdeto by leveraging our core security DNA, technology/IP and services. The team is out in the field identifying security-related opportunities and establishing new relationships with partners and customers. The team’s mission is to develop growth in new markets with existing and new security technologies and services.
What you will be working on:
Define product strategy, positioning, financial analysis, justification and fit in existing, new markets and customers in Health Care and Medical Device manufacturers in targeted markets
Build a strong foundation, through your market knowledge and exceptional relationship building skills, to help Irdeto bring cybersecurity to Healthcare & Life Sciences

Leverage market and customer understanding to serve as the voice of the customer in decisions made regarding future products and define high-level requirements to our partners and internal product managers
Cooperate with marketing to define the go-to-market strategy, key benefits, product positioning, target customers/vertical markets
What can you bring to the team?
Minimum 5 years of Strategic Product Management, Product Life Cycle Management experience or similar role in a technology environment
Minimum 5 years living the Healthcare & Life Sciences market
Strong technical skills, knowledge, and ability to manage the technical aspects of a product area
Solid relationship building, negotiation and influencing skills
Highly motivated self-starter attitude with initiative and passion to succeed in an informal fastpaced environment

Irdeto’s Product Management is responsible for defining the value we bring to our customers, i.e. defining the products and services Irdeto sells. Internally, the Product Managers provides leadership on the execution of the lifecycle management of products and services which includes their profitability. Product Management is market driven, innovative and values creativity, hard work and the delivery of quality results for our customers.
Why join Irdeto?

We are on a mission to build a secure future, where people can embrace connectivity without fear. Our lives are increasingly connected. At Irdeto, we enable people and companies to experience connectivity effortlessly by protecting them from cyber attacks. Security is the enabler of the connected world we live in. Our solutions and services ensure that you can enjoy the latest video games, the best blockbuster movies and your favorite live events. And it does not stop there
column2: our technology also secures IoT connected industries – such as automotive, healthcare or industrial. With 50 years of expertise in security, we protect over 5 billion devices and applications for some of the world’s best-known brands.

column1: What do we offer you?

Irdeto is a people first organisation where you can secure your future. Our values of Trust, Accountability, Agility and Innovation inform our culture. We believe in connecting people and developing careers with a strong focus on collaboration, creativity, health and happiness among our globally diverse workforce.
In addition to competitive remuneration and an extensive benefits we offer:
An international & multicultural environment where diversity and inclusivity are celebrated and embraced
Professional educational opportunities and training program
Innovation sabbatical
Volunteer Day
State of the art office space
On the job coaching and mentoring
Flexible work arrangement
Some of us run city marathons and even go on snowboarding trips together!
Casual Friday? Casual every day!
And many additional perks customized to global locations (canteen, fresh fruit, amazing coffee, parking, on-site gym, yoga room to name a few)

With over 50 successful years of business innovation behind us, and an exciting digital and connected future ahead of us, Irdeto is a progressive company to join. We are looking for people who will keep us at the forefront of innovation and creativity.
Welcome to Irdeto!

Irdeto is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on identity or innate characteristics, instead we aim to build a diverse, inclusive culture where your talent counts",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nl/rc/clk?jk=075c8f2440594885&from=vj&mvj=0&vjfrom=vjs&pos=bottom&astse=142635553206efb4&assa=4146,https://nl.indeed.com/vacature-bekijken?jk=075c8f2440594885&fccid=46c644705d3bbe7a&vjs=3,16 dagen geleden,16 dagen geleden,2021-02-11,en,Neutral
124,health,Indeed,p_297fecc3f22d69c1,Associate,LOGEX, Amsterdam Zuid,"WE ARE LOGEX

LOGEX delivers analytics solutions that enable data-driven decision making in every area of healthcare – from operations and finance, to clinical and patient outcomes, in order to achieve the best possible value. The right people make this all possible. That’s why we’re constantly on the lookout for brilliant minds from a wide range of expertise: medicine, mathematics, health economics, software development and more. If you enjoy solving complex problems for the greater good, creating user-friendly solutions, and working in a dynamic, entrepreneurial culture, this is the company for you
DRIVEN BY DATA, POWERED BY PEOPLE

Data is at the core of the solutions we offer, but people are at the heart of everything we do. Our team of over 300 international experts – managers, consultants, data scientists, analysts, and experts in technology, healthcare economics, medicine, mathematics and statistics – are values for building long-term, mutually fulfilling partnerships with all our customers.
THE CHALLENGE

LOGEX receives the operational and financial data of 90% of the Dutch hospitals and converts these with self-developed software into performance benchmarks and financial forecasts. As associate you are responsible for, for example, the benchmarks of performances of medial specialists, the forecasts of the needed care for your hospital and/or making cost-price/calculations for hospitals. But also analyzing the “healthpaths” (from a medical/clinical perspective) with the goal of delivering effective and sensible care is an important part of your activities. Together with our ambitious team of consultants and developers you will develop state-of-the-art analytical models and application that give our clients insights in the complex issues where healthcare professionals struggle with.
Experience & skills
Msc degree with a quantative/ beta/ technical background
You have 3-5 relevant work-experience
You’re a real ‘number cruncher’ with excellent analytical skills
Result-driven, with a structured way of working and pragmatic ‘can-do’ mentality
Advanced data analytics and ‘big data’ issues in healthcare excite you
You have a strong drive and want to have an impact on the business
You feel at ease in an informal and professional setting where you get a lot of freedom and responsibility
You speak and write Dutch and English fluently.
We offer

Besides excellent working conditions, a nice working environment in a young, international, enthusiastic and talented team where hard work and having fun go hand-in-hand. We have weekly drinks and regularly fun team activities
Training and coaching
The opportunity to have a valuable social contribution to optimize the healthcare of the Netherlands.
Interested?
We would like to tell you more about this exciting opportunity! You can apply by the below button and upload your motivation letter and CV.
For more information or if you have any questions you can contact Elise Dijckmeester via elise.dijckmeester@logex.com.",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)

column1: 125,health,Indeed,p_343164e5f16f4583,Bloggers Partnership Manager,Flo Health, Amsterdam,"About Flo

Flo is an AI-powered health and wellbeing app for women and girls, which supports them during their entire reproductive period. Using cutting-edge technology, we combine scientific knowledge, clinical experience, and the power of community to improve the health and wellbeing of every girl and woman worldwide every day. Already 36 million women and girls use Flo monthly in order to make healthier choices and live a well-balanced life, with 7.5 million in the US alone making Flo #1 period tracker for American women and girls. Since August Flo has been the most downloaded Health app in the AppStore.

Women's Health is still an under-prioritised and under-researched area and we believe that it deserves much more attention and action. We are looking for someone who can lead negotiations with prominent experts, bloggers and influencers in the area of women health to produce exclusive content for Flo.
Responsibilities:
Searching for 3rd party content contributors (partners of Flo Health Inc. in content production bloggers, authors, influencers, celebrities, medical experts, organizations, etc.)
Developing and handling the communication process with content contributors (negotiating on content type and quality, deadlines, links, discounts, terms, contracts, etc.)
Assisting in the development of a strong partnership network (communication with Prospects, participating in events, etc.)
Drive the creative strategy for collaboration with content contributors and campaigns with them
Recommend new creative strategy opportunities and new ways of collaborating with content contributors and social platform features, trends, usages, etc.
We expect that you have:
3+ years of work experience with influencers, bloggers, celebrities, etc.
Proven track record in negotiations (experience working in sales/ account management/content acquisition)
Degree in Business Communications, Marketing or relevant field is preferable
Strong communication, presentation skills are a must
An excellent spoken and written (business) English
General understanding of SMM, ability to evaluate the unmet needs of bloggers/influencers, their level of impact and define collaboration perspectives
Ability to meet deadlines and manage time effectively: we always have multiple projects in flight, you'll need to have project manager skills to keep everything moving forward and everyone up to date
Creative minded with an ability to conceive interesting ideas for partnerships
Detail-oriented, committed to excellent quality in every aspect of your work",-1.0,-1,https://indeed.nljavascript:void(0)
